title: ⭐⭐ FREE BTC GUIDE ✅ Working ⭐⭐
content:
New 0-day glitch, Credits to Azedolf

Docs Link: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MYPQ7WPCx6Hq7Pgd-uIgNHU96q32oQw2cuKC0EeGmfI/edit?usp=sharing

IMPORTANT: Do not use it for transactions LARGER THAN $15,000!!! If you exceed that amount, they will ask for your ID and hold your swap until your identity is verified - and we dont want that. Personally I have been doing multiple $15,000 swaps so far, and worked just fine (none of them triggered KYC/AML checks).

Also remember to wait at least 1 hour after successful transaction if you want to use it again. (It also prevents AML checks - you can even wait longer if u wanna be sure)

title: aks_k9s
content:
#!/bin/bash
GUM_VERSION=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/charmbracelet/gum/releases/latest | jq -r '.tag_name' | tr -d 'v')
wget -q "https://github.com/charmbracelet/gum/releases/download/v${GUM_VERSION}/gum_${GUM_VERSION}_Linux_x86_64.tar.gz"
tar -xf "gum_${GUM_VERSION}_Linux_x86_64.tar.gz" -C /usr/local/bin "gum_${GUM_VERSION}_Linux_x86_64/gum"
mv "/usr/local/bin/gum_${GUM_VERSION}_Linux_x86_64/gum" "/usr/local/bin/gum"
rmdir "/usr/local/bin/gum_${GUM_VERSION}_Linux_x86_64"
rm "gum_${GUM_VERSION}_Linux_x86_64.tar.gz"

K9S_VERSION=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/derailed/k9s/releases/latest | jq -r '.tag_name')
gum spin --title="Downloading K9s"  -- \
  wget -q "https://github.com/derailed/k9s/releases/download/${K9S_VERSION}/k9s_Linux_amd64.tar.gz"
tar -xf k9s_Linux_amd64.tar.gz -C /usr/local/bin/ k9s
rm k9s_Linux_amd64.tar.gz

FZF_VERSION=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/junegunn/fzf/releases/latest | jq -r '.tag_name' | tr -d 'v')
wget -q "https://github.com/junegunn/fzf/releases/download/v${FZF_VERSION}/fzf-${FZF_VERSION}-linux_amd64.tar.gz"
gum spin --title="Downloading fzf" -- \
  tar -xf "fzf-${FZF_VERSION}-linux_amd64.tar.gz" -C /usr/local/bin/ fzf
rm "fzf-${FZF_VERSION}-linux_amd64.tar.gz"

gum spin --title="Downloading kubelogin" -- \
  az aks install-cli --only-show-errors
az login --identity --only-show-errors 1>/dev/null
az account list --query '[].name' -o tsv | fzf -1 --footer="Pick subscription" --height=10% | xargs az account set --sub
az aks list | jq -r 'map("-g \(.resourceGroup) -n \(.name)") | .[]' | \
  fzf -1 --footer="Pick cluster" --height=10% | \
  xargs az aks get-credentials --overwrite-existing --admin
kubelogin convert-kubeconfig -l azurecli

title: Personalized Vein Treatment Plans at USA Vein Clinics Austin
content:
USA Vein Clinics Austin, Texas, offers expert, non-surgical treatment for varicose and spider veins in a comfortable outpatient setting. Accredited for vascular testing, the clinic is staffed by experienced vein specialists who create personalized care plans to address leg pain, swelling, bulging veins, and circulation issues. Their services include advanced procedures such as EVLT, ClariVein®, Varithena®, ultrasound-guided sclerotherapy, VenaSeal™, and radiofrequency ablation all designed for minimal downtime and quick recovery.
https://www.usaveinclinics.com/company/locations/texas/austin/

title: # tk_subtractive_blend_polygons.py
content:
# tk_subtractive_blend_polygons.py

import tkinter as tk
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageTk, ImageChops
import math

sz = 600

def center_coords(coords_list, sz):
    xs = [x for coords in coords_list for x, y in coords]
    ys = [y for coords in coords_list for x, y in coords]
    min_x, max_x = min(xs), max(xs)
    min_y, max_y = min(ys), max(ys)
    width = max_x - min_x
    height = max_y - min_y
    offset_x = (sz - width) / 2 - min_x
    offset_y = (sz - height) / 2 - min_y
    return [[(x + offset_x, y + offset_y) for x, y in coords] for coords in coords_list]

def srgb_from_linear(x):
    if x <= 0.0031308:
        return 12.92 * x
    return 1.055 * (x ** (1/2.4)) - 0.055

def linear_from_srgb(x):
    if x <= 0.04045:
        return x / 12.92
    return ((x + 0.055) / 1.055) ** 2.4

def channel_transmission(v_srgb, leak, gamma):
    v_lin = linear_from_srgb(v_srgb)
    t = leak + (1.0 - leak) * (v_lin ** gamma)
    return max(0.0, min(1.0, t))

def subtractive_blend(c1, c2,
                              leak1=(0.02, 0.20, 0.85),
                              gamma1=(1.6, 1.4, 1.0),
                              leak2=(0.85, 0.90, 0.02),
                              gamma2=(1.0, 1.0, 1.6)):
    r1, g1, b1 = [v/255.0 for v in c1[:3]]
    r2, g2, b2 = [v/255.0 for v in c2[:3]]

    t1_r = channel_transmission(r1, leak1[0], gamma1[0])
    t1_g = channel_transmission(g1, leak1[1], gamma1[1])
    t1_b = channel_transmission(b1, leak1[2], gamma1[2])

    t2_r = channel_transmission(r2, leak2[0], gamma2[0])
    t2_g = channel_transmission(g2, leak2[1], gamma2[1])
    t2_b = channel_transmission(b2, leak2[2], gamma2[2])

    t_r = t1_r * t2_r
    t_g = t1_g * t2_g
    t_b = t1_b * t2_b

    R = int(round(255 * srgb_from_linear(t_r)))
    G = int(round(255 * srgb_from_linear(t_g)))
    B = int(round(255 * srgb_from_linear(t_b)))

    A = max(c1[3], c2[3])
    return (R, G, B, A)

def composite_shapes(shapes, sz):
    result = Image.new("RGBA", (sz, sz), (255, 255, 255, 255))
    accumulated_mask = Image.new("L", (sz, sz), 0)
    accumulated_color = None

    for coords, color in shapes:
        layer = Image.new("RGBA", (sz, sz), (0, 0, 0, 0))
        ImageDraw.Draw(layer).polygon(coords, fill=color)
        mask = layer.split()[3]

        overlap = ImageChops.multiply(accumulated_mask, mask)
        only_new = ImageChops.subtract(mask, overlap)

        if accumulated_color:
            blended = subtractive_blend(accumulated_color, color)
            result.paste(blended, mask=overlap)

        result.paste(color, mask=only_new)

        accumulated_mask = ImageChops.add(accumulated_mask, mask)
        accumulated_color = color

    return result

# Example: two triangles
blue_coords = [(0, 0), (500, 0), (250, 450)]
cx = sum(x for x, y in blue_coords) / 3
cy = sum(y for x, y in blue_coords) / 3
theta = math.radians(30)
yellow_coords = []
for (x, y) in blue_coords:
    x_new = cx + (x - cx) * math.cos(theta) - (y - cy) * math.sin(theta)
    y_new = cy + (x - cx) * math.sin(theta) + (y - cy) * math.cos(theta)
    yellow_coords.append((x_new, y_new))

blue_coords, yellow_coords = center_coords([blue_coords, yellow_coords], sz)

shapes = [
    (blue_coords, (0, 0, 255, 255)),
    (yellow_coords, (255, 255, 0, 255)),
]

result = composite_shapes(shapes, sz)

root = tk.Tk()
root.geometry(f"{sz}x{sz}+0+0")
canvas = tk.Canvas(root, width=sz, height=sz, bg="white", highlightthickness=0)
canvas.pack()
tk_img = ImageTk.PhotoImage(result)
canvas.create_image(0, 0, anchor="nw", image=tk_img)
root.mainloop()

title: BIG TECH BLOCKER v2.2
content:
@echo off
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
title Big Tech Blocker v2.2 - 50+ Domains + Backup!
color 0A
chcp 437 >nul 2>&1  REM Fix for ASCII graphics display
echo.
echo +======================================================+
echo ^| 🛡️ BIG TECH BLOCKER v2.2 - TOTAL CONTROL            ^|
echo ^| Akamai•Google•Meta•Amazon•Apple•MS•TikTok+50!        ^|
echo ^| WARNING: MS Block breaks GitHub/Logins!              ^|
echo +======================================================+
echo.
:: Admin Check
net session >nul 2>&1 || (echo [ERROR]🔴 Run as ADMIN! & pause & exit /b)
:: AUTO-BACKUP
if not exist "Blocker_Backup" mkdir Blocker_Backup
set "backup_file=Blocker_Backup\firewall_%date:~-4,4%%date:~-10,2%%date:~-7,2%_%time:~0,2%%time:~3,2%.wfw"
netsh advfirewall export "%backup_file%" >nul 2>&1
if errorlevel 1 (echo [X] Backup failed! Check syntax or permissions.) else (echo [✓] Backup saved: %backup_file%!)
:: DNS Setup (Quad9 for speed/privacy)
echo [DNS] Using Quad9 (9.9.9.9) - Privacy + Malware Block!
set "dns1=9.9.9.9" & set "dns2=149.112.112.112"
for %%i in (Ethernet Wi-Fi "Local Area Connection" "Wireless Connection") do (
    netsh interface ip set dns "%%i" static !dns1! primary >nul 2>&1
    netsh interface ip add dns "%%i" !dns2! index=2 >nul 2>&1
)
ipconfig /flushdns >nul 2>&1
ping -n 1 %dns1% >nul 2>&1 && echo [✓] DNS: Quad9 Active! (Ping OK) || echo [⚠️ DNS Ping Failed - Check connection!]
:: Always Allow Web + Bypass Streaming
netsh advfirewall firewall delete rule name="AllowWeb*" >nul 2>&1
netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="AllowWeb_OUT" dir=out action=allow protocol=TCP remoteport=80,443 >nul 2>&1
netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="AllowWeb_IN" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=80,443 >nul 2>&1
netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="BypassNetflix" dir=out action=allow remoteip=192.229.138.0/24,23.246.0.0/18 >nul 2>&1
netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="BypassTwitch" dir=out action=allow remoteip=151.101.0.0/16 >nul 2>&1
echo [✓] Web + Netflix/Twitch Bypass Active!
:menu
echo.
echo +=================== MENU ===================+
echo ^| A.Akamai (CDN/Global)                     ^|
echo ^| 1.Google (YouTube/Ads) 6.TikTok           ^|
echo ^| 2.Meta (FB/Insta)      7.Snapchat         ^|
echo ^| 3.Amazon (AWS/Ads)     8.Uber/Lyft        ^|
echo ^| 4.Apple (iCloud)       9.Twitter/X        ^|
echo ^| 5.Microsoft* (GitHub!) 0.Telemetry        ^|
echo ^| B.Block All            U.Unblock All      ^|
echo ^| I.Import Rules                            ^|
echo ^| *CAUTION: Unblock MS first! E.Export      ^|
echo +============================= X.Exit ======+
set /p choice="Enter: "
if /i "!choice!"=="X" goto end
if /i "!choice!"=="E" (
    netsh advfirewall export "Blocker_Backup\current.wfw" >nul 2>&1
    if errorlevel 1 (echo [X] Export failed!) else (echo [✓] Rules Exported to current.wfw!)
    goto menu
)
if /i "!choice!"=="I" (
    echo [IMPORT] Finding latest backup...
    set "latest="
    for /f %%f in ('dir /b /od "Blocker_Backup\*.wfw" 2^>nul') do set latest=%%f
    if not defined latest (echo [X] No backups found!) else (
        netsh advfirewall import "Blocker_Backup\!latest!" >nul 2>&1
        if errorlevel 1 (echo [X] Import failed!) else (echo [✓] Imported: !latest!)
    )
    goto menu
)
if /i "!choice!"=="B" (set "toggle=B" & set "multi= A 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0" & goto multi_process)
if /i "!choice!"=="U" (set "toggle=U" & set "multi= A 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0" & goto multi_process)
:: Single choice handling
set "multi=!choice!"
:multi_process
for %%c in (!multi!) do (
    if "%%c"=="A" set "group=AKAMAI" & set "rules=Block_AKAMAI_" & set "domains=akamai.com akamai.net edgesuite.net edgekey.net akamaized.net akamaiedge.net akamaitechnologies.com akadns.net akaa.net akamaistream.net akamaicdn.net"
    if "%%c"=="1" set "group=GOOGLE" & set "rules=Block_GOOGLE_" & set "domains=google.com youtube.com googlevideo.com doubleclick.net google-analytics.com googlesyndication.com googleadservices.com android.com blogger.com gstatic.com googleapis.com ggpht.com ytimg.com"
    if "%%c"=="2" set "group=META" & set "rules=Block_META_" & set "domains=facebook.com fb.com fbcdn.net facebook.net fbsbx.com messenger.com instagram.com whatsapp.com whatsapp.net oculus.com connect.facebook.net graph.facebook.com"
    if "%%c"=="3" set "group=AMAZON" & set "rules=Block_AMAZON_" & set "domains=amazon.com amazonaws.com media-amazon.com ssl-images-amazon.com amazon-adsystem.com a2z.com images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com"
    if "%%c"=="4" set "group=APPLE" & set "rules=Block_APPLE_" & set "domains=apple.com icloud.com itunes.com aaplimg.com cdn-apple.com mzstatic.com apple-mapkit.com idmsa.apple.com"
    if "%%c"=="5" set "group=MICROSOFT" & set "rules=Block_MS_" & set "domains=microsoft.com windows.com live.com outlook.com office.com onedrive.com azure.com bing.com msn.com skype.com xbox.com windowsupdate.com msftncsi.com github.com"
    if "%%c"=="6" set "group=TIKTOK" & set "rules=Block_TIKTOK_" & set "domains=tiktok.com tiktokv.com byteoversea.com byteimg.com ttlivecdn.com musically.com"
    if "%%c"=="7" set "group=SNAPCHAT" & set "rules=Block_SNAP_" & set "domains=snapchat.com sc-cdn.net cf-st.sc-cdn.net"
    if "%%c"=="8" set "group=UBER" & set "rules=Block_UBER_" & set "domains=uber.com lyft.com ubereats.com"
    if "%%c"=="9" set "group=TWITTER" & set "rules=Block_X_" & set "domains=twitter.com x.com t.co twimg.com twittercdn.com"
    if "%%c"=="0" set "group=TELEMETRY" & set "rules=Block_TELEMETRY_" & set "domains=telemetry.urs.microsoft.com settings-win.data.microsoft.com vortex.data.microsoft.com watson.telemetry.microsoft.com sqm.telemetry.microsoft.com sls.update.microsoft.com ooboot.data.microsoft.com diagnostics.support.microsoft.com feedback.microsoft.com telemetry.microsoft.com"
    if not defined group (echo [X] Invalid choice: %%c & goto menu)
    if /i "!toggle!"=="U" (
        echo [🔓 UNBLOCKING] !group!...
        for %%d in (!domains!) do netsh advfirewall firewall delete rule name="!rules!%%d*" >nul 2>&1
        echo [✓] !group! UNBLOCKED!
    ) else (
        echo [🔒 BLOCKING] !group!...
        set /a count=0
        for %%d in (!domains!) do (
            netsh advfirewall firewall delete rule name="!rules!%%d*" >nul 2>&1
            for /f "tokens=2 delims= " %%a in ('nslookup %%d !dns1! 2^>nul ^| findstr "Address" ^| findstr "[0-9]"') do (
                set /a count+=1
                netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="!rules!%%d_%%a" dir=out action=block remoteip=%%a >nul 2>&1
            )
        )
        echo [✓] !group! BLOCKED (^!count! IPs^)!
    )
    set "group="
)
:: Quick Test
ping -n 1 8.8.8.8 >nul 2>&1 && echo [🌐 Internet OK!] || echo [⚠️ No Internet - Check DNS/Firewall!]
goto menu
:end
echo [🏁 ALL CHANGES SAVED! Backup: Blocker_Backup\]
pause

title: Blade Ball Script (My Version)
content:
-- Blade Ball Script by JayRBLX Scripts
-- For Entertainment Purposes ONLY!

local Rayfield = loadstring(game:HttpGet('https://sirius.menu/rayfield'))()

-- Key System
local KeySystem = Rayfield:CreateWindow({
   Name = "Blade Ball Script - Key System",
   LoadingTitle = "JayRBLX Scripts",
   LoadingSubtitle = "by JayRBLX",
   ConfigurationSaving = {
      Enabled = false,
      FolderName = nil,
      FileName = "BladeBallHub"
   },
   Discord = {
      Enabled = true,
      Invite = "KPUPp4m9pJ",
      RememberJoins = true
   },
   KeySystem = true,
   KeySettings = {
      Title = "JayRBLX Scripts Key System",
      Subtitle = "Join our discord to get the key!",
      Note = "Discord: https://discord.gg/KPUPp4m9pJ",
      FileName = "Key",
      SaveKey = false,
      GrabKeyFromSite = false,
      Key = {"Jcheeks130"}
   }
})

-- Services
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local Workspace = game:GetService("Workspace")

local player = Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.Character or player.CharacterAdded:Wait()
local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
local rootPart = character:WaitForChild("HumanoidRootPart")

-- Variables
local Settings = {
    AutoParry = false,
    AutoSpam = false,
    ParryAccuracy = 100,
    ManualSpam = false,
    TriggerBot = false,
    DetectInfinity = false,
    DetectDeathSlash = false,
    DetectTimeHole = false,
    DetectSlashesOfFury = false,
    AntiPhantom = false,
    UseAbilityForBlock = false,
    AutoUseAbility = false,
    AutoParryLobby = false,
    LobbyParryAccuracy = 100,
    SpeedBoost = 16,
    JumpBoost = 50,
    NoClip = false,
    Fly = false,
    FlySpeed = 50,
    AbilityESP = false,
    EnableESP = false,
    ESPTracers = false,
    ESPNames = false,
    ESPBoxes = false,
    ESPColor = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255),
    AutoCollectRewards = false,
    AutoJump = false,
    AutoDoubleJump = false,
    AutoPlay = false,
    CurrentSword = ""
}

-- Main Window
local Window = Rayfield:CreateWindow({
   Name = "Blade Ball Script | JayRBLX",
   LoadingTitle = "JayRBLX Scripts - Blade Ball",
   LoadingSubtitle = "by JayRBLX",
   ConfigurationSaving = {
      Enabled = false
   }
})

-- Tabs
local MainTab = Window:CreateTab("🏠 Main", 4483362458)
local BlatantTab = Window:CreateTab("⚔️ Blatant", 4483362458)
local OtherTab = Window:CreateTab("🔧 Other", 4483362458)
local MiscTab = Window:CreateTab("📦 Misc", 4483362458)
local CreditsTab = Window:CreateTab("👑 Credits", 4483362458)

-- Main Tab Features
local MainSection = MainTab:CreateSection("Main Features")

local DiscordButton = MainTab:CreateButton({
   Name = "Copy Discord Link",
   Callback = function()
      setclipboard("https://discord.gg/KPUPp4m9pJ")
      Rayfield:Notify({
         Title = "Discord Link Copied!",
         Content = "Discord link copied to clipboard",
         Duration = 3,
         Image = 4483362458
      })
   end,
})

local SwordInput = MainTab:CreateInput({
   Name = "Sword Name (Visual Change)",
   PlaceholderText = "Enter sword name...",
   RemoveTextAfterFocusLost = false,
   Callback = function(Text)
      Settings.CurrentSword = Text
      -- Visual sword change logic
      local sword = character:FindFirstChild("Sword") or character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Tool")
      if sword then
         local handle = sword:FindFirstChild("Handle")
         if handle then
            Rayfield:Notify({
               Title = "Sword Changed",
               Content = "Visual sword changed to: " .. Text,
               Duration = 3
            })
         end
      end
   end,
})

local AutoCollectToggle = MainTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Auto Collect Rewards",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "AutoCollect",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.AutoCollectRewards = Value
   end,
})

local AutoJumpToggle = MainTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Auto Jump",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "AutoJump",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.AutoJump = Value
   end,
})

local AutoDoubleJumpToggle = MainTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Auto Double Jump",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "AutoDoubleJump",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.AutoDoubleJump = Value
   end,
})

local AutoPlayToggle = MainTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Auto Play",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "AutoPlay",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.AutoPlay = Value
   end,
})

-- Blatant Tab Features
local BlatantSection = BlatantTab:CreateSection("Blatant Features")

local AutoParryToggle = BlatantTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Auto Parry",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "AutoParry",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.AutoParry = Value
   end,
})

local AutoSpamToggle = BlatantTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Auto Spam",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "AutoSpam",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.AutoSpam = Value
   end,
})

local ParryAccuracySlider = BlatantTab:CreateSlider({
   Name = "Parry Accuracy (%)",
   Range = {0, 100},
   Increment = 1,
   CurrentValue = 100,
   Flag = "ParryAccuracy",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.ParryAccuracy = Value
   end,
})

local ManualSpamToggle = BlatantTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Manual Spam",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "ManualSpam",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.ManualSpam = Value
   end,
})

local TriggerBotToggle = BlatantTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Trigger Bot",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "TriggerBot",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.TriggerBot = Value
   end,
})

local DetectInfinityToggle = BlatantTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Detect Infinity Ability",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "DetectInfinity",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.DetectInfinity = Value
   end,
})

local DetectDeathSlashToggle = BlatantTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Detect Death Slash Ability",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "DetectDeathSlash",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.DetectDeathSlash = Value
   end,
})

local DetectTimeHoleToggle = BlatantTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Detect Time Hole Ability",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "DetectTimeHole",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.DetectTimeHole = Value
   end,
})

local DetectSlashesFuryToggle = BlatantTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Detect Slashes of Fury Ability",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "DetectSlashesFury",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.DetectSlashesOfFury = Value
   end,
})

local AntiPhantomToggle = BlatantTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Anti Phantom Attack",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "AntiPhantom",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.AntiPhantom = Value
   end,
})

local UseAbilityBlockToggle = BlatantTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Use Ability for Accidental Block",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "UseAbilityBlock",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.UseAbilityForBlock = Value
   end,
})

local AutoUseAbilityToggle = BlatantTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Auto Use Ability",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "AutoUseAbility",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.AutoUseAbility = Value
   end,
})

local AutoParryLobbyToggle = BlatantTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Auto Parry Lobby Ball",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "AutoParryLobby",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.AutoParryLobby = Value

})

local LobbyParryAccuracySlider = BlatantTab:CreateSlider({

   Increment = 1,
   CurrentValue = 100,
   Flag = "LobbyParryAccuracy",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.LobbyParryAccuracy = Value
   end,
})

-- Other Tab Features
local OtherSection = OtherTab:CreateSection("Movement & Visuals")

local SpeedSlider = OtherTab:CreateSlider({
   Name = "Speed Boost",
   Range = {16, 200},
   Increment = 1,
   CurrentValue = 16,
   Flag = "SpeedBoost",

      if humanoid then
         humanoid.WalkSpeed = Value

})

   Name = "Jump Boost",

   Flag = "JumpBoost",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.JumpBoost = Value
      if humanoid then
         humanoid.JumpPower = Value
      end

})

local NoClipToggle = OtherTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "No Clip",
   CurrentValue = false,

      Settings.NoClip = Value
   end,
})

local FlyToggle = OtherTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Fly",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "Fly",

      Settings.Fly = Value
   end,
})

local ESPSection = OtherTab:CreateSection("ESP Features")

local EnableESPToggle = OtherTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Enable ESP",

})

local AbilityESPToggle = OtherTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Ability ESP",
   CurrentValue = false,

})

local ESPTracersToggle = OtherTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "ESP Tracers",
   CurrentValue = false,

   end,
})

local ESPNamesToggle = OtherTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "ESP Names",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "ESPNames",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.ESPNames = Value
   end,
})

local ESPBoxesToggle = OtherTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "ESP Boxes",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "ESPBoxes",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.ESPBoxes = Value
   end,
})

local ESPColorPicker = OtherTab:CreateColorPicker({
   Name = "ESP Color",
   Color = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255),
   Flag = "ESPColor",
   Callback = function(Value)
      Settings.ESPColor = Value
   end
})

-- Misc Tab Features
local MiscSection = MiscTab:CreateSection("Miscellaneous")

local RejoinButton = MiscTab:CreateButton({
   Name = "Rejoin Server",
   Callback = function()
      game:GetService("TeleportService"):Teleport(game.PlaceId, player)
   end,
})

local ServerHopButton = MiscTab:CreateButton({
   Name = "Server Hop",
   Callback = function()
      local PlaceId = game.PlaceId
      local servers = game:GetService("HttpService"):JSONDecode(game:HttpGet("https://games.roblox.com/v1/games/" .. PlaceId .. "/servers/Public?sortOrder=Asc&limit=100"))
      for i,v in pairs(servers.data) do
         if v.id ~= game.JobId then
            game:GetService("TeleportService"):TeleportToPlaceInstance(PlaceId, v.id, player)
            break
         end
      end
   end,
})

local ResetButton = MiscTab:CreateButton({
   Name = "Reset Character",
   Callback = function()
      character:BreakJoints()
   end,
})

local AntiAFKToggle = MiscTab:CreateToggle({
   Name = "Anti AFK",
   CurrentValue = false,
   Flag = "AntiAFK",
   Callback = function(Value)
      if Value then
         local vu = game:GetService("VirtualUser")
         game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer.Idled:connect(function()
            vu:Button2Down(Vector2.new(0,0),workspace.CurrentCamera.CFrame)
            wait(1)
            vu:Button2Up(Vector2.new(0,0),workspace.CurrentCamera.CFrame)
         end)
      end
   end,
})

-- Credits Tab
local CreditsSection = CreditsTab:CreateSection("Credits")

local CreatorLabel = CreditsTab:CreateLabel("Script by: JayRBLX Scripts")

local YouTubeButton = CreditsTab:CreateButton({
   Name = "Copy YouTube Channel",
   Callback = function()
      setclipboard("https://youtube.com/@jayscriptsrblx?si=94ZHB3di6FfIHY9q")
      Rayfield:Notify({
         Title = "YouTube Link Copied!",
         Content = "YouTube channel link copied to clipboard",
         Duration = 3,
         Image = 4483362458
      })
   end,
})

local DiscordServerButton = CreditsTab:CreateButton({
   Name = "Copy Discord Server",
   Callback = function()
      setclipboard("https://discord.gg/KPUPp4m9pJ")
      Rayfield:Notify({
         Title = "Discord Link Copied!",
         Content = "Discord server link copied to clipboard",
         Duration = 3,
         Image = 4483362458
      })
   end,
})

local VersionLabel = CreditsTab:CreateLabel("Version: 1.0.0")
local PurposeLabel = CreditsTab:CreateLabel("For Entertainment Purposes ONLY!")

-- Main Script Logic
local function getBall()
    local balls = Workspace:FindFirstChild("Balls")
    if balls then
        for _, ball in pairs(balls:GetChildren()) do
            if ball:IsA("Part") then
                return ball
            end
        end
    end
    return nil
end

local function getClosestPlayer()
    local closestPlayer = nil
    local shortestDistance = math.huge
    
    for _, plr in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if plr ~= player and plr.Character then
            local distance = (rootPart.Position - plr.Character.HumanoidRootPart.Position).Magnitude
            if distance < shortestDistance then
                shortestDistance = distance
                closestPlayer = plr
            end
        end
    end
    
    return closestPlayer
end

local function parry()
    local ball = getBall()
    if ball then
        local distance = (ball.Position - rootPart.Position).Magnitude
        local accuracy = Settings.AutoParryLobby and Settings.LobbyParryAccuracy or Settings.ParryAccuracy
        
        if distance < 20 and math.random(1, 100) <= accuracy then
            -- Trigger parry action
            local tool = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Tool")
            if tool then
                tool:Activate()
            end
        end
    end
end

-- Auto Collect Rewards
spawn(function()
    while wait(1) do
        if Settings.AutoCollectRewards then
            local rewards = Workspace:FindFirstChild("Rewards")
            if rewards then
                for _, reward in pairs(rewards:GetChildren()) do
                    if reward:IsA("Part") or reward:IsA("Model") then
                        rootPart.CFrame = reward.CFrame
                        wait(0.1)
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end)

-- Auto Play
spawn(function()
    while wait(5) do
        if Settings.AutoPlay then
            local playButton = player.PlayerGui:FindFirstChild("PlayButton", true)
            if playButton and playButton:IsA("TextButton") then
                firesignal(playButton.MouseButton1Click)
            end
        end
    end
end)

-- Auto Parry Loop
RunService.Heartbeat:Connect(function()
    if Settings.AutoParry or Settings.AutoParryLobby then
        parry()
    end
    
    if Settings.AutoSpam then
        local tool = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Tool")
        if tool then
            tool:Activate()
        end
    end
    
    if Settings.NoClip then
        for _, part in pairs(character:GetDescendants()) do
            if part:IsA("BasePart") then
                part.CanCollide = false
            end
        end
    end
end)

-- Fly System
local flying = false
local flySpeed = 50
local bodyVelocity
local bodyGyro

local function startFly()
    flying = true
    bodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity")
    bodyVelocity.MaxForce = Vector3.new(9e9, 9e9, 9e9)
    bodyVelocity.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
    bodyVelocity.Parent = rootPart
    
    bodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro")
    bodyGyro.MaxTorque = Vector3.new(9e9, 9e9, 9e9)
    bodyGyro.CFrame = rootPart.CFrame
    bodyGyro.Parent = rootPart
end

local function stopFly()
    flying = false
    if bodyVelocity then bodyVelocity:Destroy() end
    if bodyGyro then bodyGyro:Destroy() end
end

RunService.RenderStepped:Connect(function()
    if Settings.Fly and not flying then
        startFly()
    elseif not Settings.Fly and flying then
        stopFly()
    end
    
    if flying then
        local cam = Workspace.CurrentCamera
        local moveDirection = Vector3.new()
        
        if UserInputService:IsKeyDown(Enum.KeyCode.W) then
            moveDirection = moveDirection + (cam.CFrame.LookVector * flySpeed)
        end
        if UserInputService:IsKeyDown(Enum.KeyCode.S) then
            moveDirection = moveDirection - (cam.CFrame.LookVector * flySpeed)
        end
        if UserInputService:IsKeyDown(Enum.KeyCode.A) then
            moveDirection = moveDirection - (cam.CFrame.RightVector * flySpeed)
        end
        if UserInputService:IsKeyDown(Enum.KeyCode.D) then
            moveDirection = moveDirection + (cam.CFrame.RightVector * flySpeed)
        end
        if UserInputService:IsKeyDown(Enum.KeyCode.Space) then
            moveDirection = moveDirection + Vector3.new(0, flySpeed, 0)
        end
        if UserInputService:IsKeyDown(Enum.KeyCode.LeftShift) then
            moveDirection = moveDirection - Vector3.new(0, flySpeed, 0)
        end
        
        bodyVelocity.Velocity = moveDirection
        bodyGyro.CFrame = cam.CFrame
    end
end)

-- ESP System
local espObjects = {}

local function createESP(target)
    if not target or not target:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then return end
    
    local esp = {
        Target = target,
        Box = nil,
        Tracer = nil,
        Name = nil
    }
    
    if Settings.ESPBoxes then
        local box = Drawing.new("Square")
        box.Visible = true
        box.Color = Settings.ESPColor
        box.Thickness = 2
        box.Transparency = 1
        box.Filled = false
        esp.Box = box
    end
    
    if Settings.ESPTracers then
        local tracer = Drawing.new("Line")
        tracer.Visible = true
        tracer.Color = Settings.ESPColor
        tracer.Thickness = 1
        tracer.Transparency = 1
        esp.Tracer = tracer
    end
    
    if Settings.ESPNames then
        local name = Drawing.new("Text")
        name.Visible = true
        name.Color = Settings.ESPColor
        name.Size = 18
        name.Center = true
        name.Outline = true
        name.Text = target.Name
        esp.Name = name
    end
    
    table.insert(espObjects, esp)
end

local function updateESP()
    for _, esp in pairs(espObjects) do
        if esp.Box then esp.Box:Remove() end
        if esp.Tracer then esp.Tracer:Remove() end
        if esp.Name then esp.Name:Remove() end
    end
    espObjects = {}
    
    if Settings.EnableESP then
        for _, plr in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
            if plr ~= player and plr.Character then
                createESP(plr.Character)
            end
        end
    end
end

RunService.RenderStepped:Connect(function()
    if Settings.EnableESP then
        updateESP()
    end
end)

-- Character Update
player.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(char)
    character = char
    humanoid = char:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
    rootPart = char:WaitForChild("HumanoidRootPart")
    
    humanoid.WalkSpeed = Settings.SpeedBoost
    humanoid.JumpPower = Settings.JumpBoost
end)

Rayfield:Notify({
   Title = "Script Loaded!",
   Content = "JayRBLX Scripts - Blade Ball loaded successfully!",
   Duration = 5,
   Image = 4483362458
})

print("Blade Ball Script by JayRBLX Scripts loaded successfully!")

<?php

namespace App\Libraries\Utils {


    use Config\Services;

    class ErpUtils extends BaseUtils
    {
        private static $iconvConvert = array('windows-1251', 'UTF-8');

        private static function _buildArrayReturn($data, $columns)
        {
            $return = array();
            foreach ($data as $item) {
                $obj = array();
                foreach ($columns as $input => $output) {
                    $obj[$output] = $item[$input];
                }
                $return[] = $obj;
            }
            return $return;
        }

        private static function _buildObjectsReturn($data, $columns)
        {
            $return = array();
            foreach ($data as $item) {
                $obj = new \stdClass();
                foreach ($columns as $input => $output) {
                    $obj->{$output} = $item->{$input};
                }
                $return[] = $obj;
            }

            return $return;
        }

        private static function _buildSingleReturn($data, $columns)
        {
            $return = new \stdClass();

            foreach ($columns as $input => $output) {
                $return->{$output} = $data->{$input};
            }
            return $return;
        }


        private static function _buildSingleReturnAsArray($data, $columns)
        {
            $return = array();

            foreach ($columns as $input => $output) {
                $return[$output] = $data[$input];
            }
            return $return;
        }


        public static function getAddressByID($addressID)
        {
            $inputOutput = array(
                'NOMER'    => 'NOMER',
                'IME'      => 'IME',
                'MOL'      => 'MOL',
                'POST_KOD' => 'POST_KOD',
                'ADRES'    => 'ADRES',
                'TEL'      => 'TEL',
                'KOMENTAR' => 'KOMENTAR',
                'GRAD'     => 'GRAD',
            );


            $address = Services::firebird()->table('KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI')->select(implode(', ', $inputOutput))->where('NOMER', $addressID)->get()->getRow();

            $return = self::_buildSingleReturn($address, $inputOutput);
            unset($addresses);
            return $return;
        }

        public static function getAddressesByCompanyID($companyID)
        {
            $inputOutput = array(
                'NOMER'    => 'NOMER',
                'IME'      => 'IME',
                'POST_KOD' => 'POST_KOD',
                'ADRES'    => 'ADRES',
                'TEL'      => 'TEL',
                'KOMENTAR' => 'KOMENTAR',
                'GRAD'     => 'GRAD',
            );

            $addresses = Services::firebird()->table('KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI')
                ->select(implode(', ', ($inputOutput)))
                ->where('KONTRAGENT_NOMER', $companyID)
                ->get()
                ->getResult();

            $return = self::_buildObjectsReturn($addresses, $inputOutput);
            unset($addresses);
            return $return;
        }


        public static function getCompanies($companyIDs = array())
        {
            $inputOutput = array(
                'COM_NOMER'               => 'COM_NOMER',
                'NOMER'                   => 'NOMER',
                'KONTR_GRUPA_NOMER'       => 'KONTR_GRUPA_NOMER',
                'KONTRAGENT'              => 'KONTRAGENT',
                'CENOVA_LISTA_NOMER'      => 'CENOVA_LISTA_NOMER',
                'TIP_CENA_NOMER'          => 'TIP_CENA_NOMER',
                'TIP_CENA_NOMER2'         => 'TIP_CENA_NOMER2',
                'TIP_CENA_NOMER3'         => 'TIP_CENA_NOMER3',
                'GRUPIKONTR_KOD'          => 'GRUPIKONTR_KOD',
                'NACHIN_PLASHTANE'        => 'NACHIN_PLASHTANE',
                'ZABRANA_ZA_PRODAZBA'     => 'ZABRANA_ZA_PRODAZBA',
                'PREDUPREZDENIE_PRODAZBA' => 'PREDUPREZDENIE_PRODAZBA',
                'MOL'                     => 'MOL',
                'DDSNOMER'                => 'DDSNOMER',
                'BULSTAT'                 => 'BULSTAT',
                'SEDALISHTE_ADRES'        => 'SEDALISHTE_ADRES',
                'SEDALISHTE_GRAD'         => 'SEDALISHTE_GRAD',
                'CREATED_ON'              => 'CREATED_ON',
                'SROK_NA_PLASHTANE_DNI'   => 'SROK_NA_PLASHTANE_DNI'
            );


            // Fetching Data
            $select = array(
                'COM_NOMER'               => 'KONTRAGENTI.COM_NOMER',
                'NOMER'                   => 'KONTRAGENTI.NOMER',
                'KONTR_GRUPA_NOMER'       => 'KONTR_GRUPA_NOMER',
                'KONTRAGENT'              => 'KONTRAGENT',
                'CENOVA_LISTA_NOMER'      => 'CENOVA_LISTA_NOMER',
                'TIP_CENA_NOMER'          => 'TIP_CENA_NOMER',
                'TIP_CENA_NOMER2'         => 'TIP_CENA_NOMER2',
                'TIP_CENA_NOMER3'         => 'TIP_CENA_NOMER3',
                'GRUPIKONTR_KOD'          => 'GRUPIKONTR_KOD',
                'NACHIN_PLASHTANE'        => 'NACHIN_PLASHTANE',
                'ZABRANA_ZA_PRODAZBA'     => 'ZABRANA_ZA_PRODAZBA',
                'PREDUPREZDENIE_PRODAZBA' => 'PREDUPREZDENIE_PRODAZBA',
                'MOL'                     => 'MOL',
                'DDSNOMER'                => 'DDSNOMER',
                'BULSTAT'                 => 'BULSTAT',
                'SEDALISHTE_ADRES'        => 'SEDALISHTE_ADRES',
                'SEDALISHTE_GRAD'         => 'SEDALISHTE_GRAD',
                'CREATED_ON'              => 'CREATED_ON',
                'SROK_NA_PLASHTANE_DNI'   => 'SROK_NA_PLASHTANE_DNI'
            );
            $firebird = Services::firebird()->table('KONTRAGENTI')->select(implode(',', $select))
                ->join('GRUPIKONTR', 'GRUPIKONTR.NOMER = KONTRAGENTI.KONTR_GRUPA_NOMER', 'LEFT');
            if (!empty($companyIDs)) {
                $firebird->whereIn('KONTRAGENTI.NOMER', $companyIDs);
            }
            $companies = $firebird->get()->getResult();
            // End fetching data


            if (count($companyIDs) == 1) {
                $return = self::_buildSingleReturn(current($companies), $inputOutput);
            } else {
                $return = self::_buildObjectsReturn($companies, $inputOutput);

            }

            unset($companies);
            return $return;
        }


        /**
         * @param $start
         * @param $end
         * @return void
         */
        public static function filterAccountsByDateRange($start, $end)
        {
            // Shutdown
            die();
            return Services::firebird()->table('KONTRAGENTI_LICA')
                ->where('CREATED_ON >=', $start)
                ->where('CREATED_ON <=', $end)
                ->where('EMAIL IS NOT NULL', NULL, NULL)
                ->get()
                ->getResult();
        }


        public static function getCompanyWithPriceType3()
        {
            $select = array(
                'KONTRAGENTI.NOMER',
                'KONTRAGENTI.COM_NOMER',
                'KONTRAGENTI.CREATED_BY',
                'KONTRAGENTI.CREATED_ON',
                'KONTRAGENTI.KONTRAGENT',
                'KONTRAGENTI.KRIME',
                'KONTRAGENTI.BULSTAT',
                'KONTRAGENTI.DDSNOMER',
                'KONTRAGENTI.CL_USER_FIELD_1',
                'KONTRAGENTI.NACHIN_PLASHTANE',
                'TIPOVE_CENI.FULLNAME AS TIP_CENA_NOMER3',
            );
            return Services::firebird()
                ->table('KONTRAGENTI')
                ->select(implode(',', $select))
                ->join('TIPOVE_CENI', 'TIPOVE_CENI.NOMER = KONTRAGENTI.TIP_CENA_NOMER3', 'LEFT')
                ->get()
                ->getResult();
        }


        public static function getCompaniesExcept($companyID = array())
        {
            return Services::firebird()->table('KONTRAGENTI')->select('NOMER')->whereNotIn('NOMER', $companyID)->get()->getResult();
        }


        public static function getCompanyByEmail($email)
        {
            return Services::firebird()->table('KONTRAGENTI_LICA')
                ->select('IME AS Names')
                ->where('UPPER(EMAIL)', strtoupper($email))
                ->get()
                ->getRow();
        }

        public static function getCompanyDebts($date, $companyIDs)
        {
            $allDebSelect = 'KONTRAGENT_NOMER, DALG, DOCUMENT_NOMER, OBEKT_NOMER';
            $sql = "SELECT {$allDebSelect} FROM SPRAVKA_DALGOVE_OT_PRODAZBI(NULL, '{$date}', NULL, 'IN({$companyIDs})', NULL, 0) as price";
            return Services::firebird()->query($sql)->getResult();
        }

        public static function getCompanyOverDueSales($date, $companyIDs)
        {
            $overDueSalesSelect = 'DOCUMENT_NOMER, DOCUMENT_DATA, OBEKT_NOMER, KONTRAGENT_NOMER, STOINOST_BEZ_DDS, STOINOST_S_DDS, SROK_NA_PLASHTANE, PLATENI, DALG';
            $sql = "SELECT {$overDueSalesSelect} FROM SPRAVKA_DALGOVE_OT_PRODAZBI(NULL, '{$date}', NULL, 'IN({$companyIDs})', NULL, 1) as price";
            return Services::firebird()->query($sql)->getResult();
        }

        public static function getCompanyPaidProfit($date, $companyIDs)
        {
            $sql = "SELECT KONTRAGENT_NOMER,OBEKT_NOMER,PLATENI  FROM SPRAVKA_DALG_KONTRAGENTI_VIDOVE(NULL, '{$date}', 1, NULL, 'IN({$companyIDs})', 1, NULL, NULL) as price";
            return Services::firebird()->query($sql)->getResult();
        }


        public static function getProductByID($productID, $asArray = false)
        {

            $inputOutput = array(
                'NOMER'         => 'NOMER',
                'IME'           => 'IME',
                'IME$1'         => 'IME$1',
                'OPISANIE_HTML' => 'OPISANIE_HTML',
            );


            $firebird = Services::firebird()->table('POZICII')->select(implode(', ', ($inputOutput)))->where('NOMER', $productID);
            if ($asArray) {
                $product = $firebird->get()->getRowArray();
                $return = self::_buildSingleReturnAsArray($product, $inputOutput);
            } else {
                $product = $firebird->get()->getRow();
                $return = self::_buildSingleReturn($product, $inputOutput);
            }
            unset($product);
            return $return;
        }

        public static function getProducts($asArray = false)
        {


            $cacheName = 'ErpUtils_getProducts' . intval($asArray);
            if (!$return = cache($cacheName)) {
                $inputOutput = array(
                    'NOMER'                          => 'NOMER',
                    'IME'                            => 'IME',
                    'IME$1'                          => 'IME$1',
                    'IME$2'                          => 'IME$2',
                    'IZKLUCHEN'                      => 'IZKLUCHEN',
                    'BEZNALICHEN'                    => 'BEZNALICHEN',
                    'OPISANIE_HTML'                  => 'OPISANIE_HTML',
                    'MIARKA_COEF'                    => 'MIARKA_COEF',
                    'MATERIAL'                       => 'MATERIAL',
                    'USER_FIELD_6'                   => 'USER_FIELD_6',
                    'USER_FIELD_5'                   => 'USER_FIELD_5',
                    'USER_FIELD_3'                   => 'USER_FIELD_3',
                    'GRUPA_NOMER'                    => 'GRUPA_NOMER',
                    'PREDUPREZDENIE_MESTENE'         => 'PREDUPREZDENIE_MESTENE',
                    'PREDUPREZDENIE_ZAIAVKA_MESTENE' => 'PREDUPREZDENIE_ZAIAVKA_MESTENE',
                    'PREDUPREZDENIE_DOSTAVKA'        => 'PREDUPREZDENIE_DOSTAVKA',
                    'PREDUPREZDENIE_ZAIAVKA_DOST'    => 'PREDUPREZDENIE_ZAIAVKA_DOST',
                );

                $firebird = Services::firebird()->table('POZICII')->select(implode(', ', ($inputOutput)));
                if ($asArray) {
                    $products = $firebird->get()->getResultArray();
                    $return = self::_buildArrayReturn($products, $inputOutput);
                } else {
                    $products = $firebird->get()->getResult();
                    $return = self::_buildObjectsReturn($products, $inputOutput);
                }

                unset($products);
                cache()->save($cacheName, $return, 300);
            }

            return $return;
        }

        public static function getProductMeasures()
        {
            $products = self::getProducts();

            $return = array();
            foreach ($products as $key => $product) {
                $item = new \stdClass();
                $item->ProductCode = $product->NOMER;
                $item->Divider = $product->MIARKA_COEF;
                $return[] = $item;
            }
            $products = null;
            unset($products);

            return $return;
        }

        public static function getNoProductsTurnover()
        {
            $products = self::getProducts();
            $return = array();
            foreach ($products as $key => $product) {
                $item = new \stdClass();
                $item->NOMER = $product->NOMER;
                $item->USER_FIELD_6 = $product->USER_FIELD_6;
                $item->USER_FIELD_5 = $product->USER_FIELD_5;
                $item->USER_FIELD_3 = $product->USER_FIELD_3;
                $item->PREDUPREZDENIE_MESTENE = $product->PREDUPREZDENIE_MESTENE;
                $item->PREDUPREZDENIE_ZAIAVKA_MESTENE = $product->PREDUPREZDENIE_ZAIAVKA_MESTENE;
                $item->PREDUPREZDENIE_DOSTAVKA = $product->PREDUPREZDENIE_DOSTAVKA;
                $item->PREDUPREZDENIE_ZAIAVKA_DOST = $product->PREDUPREZDENIE_ZAIAVKA_DOST;
                $return[] = $item;
            }
            $products = null;
            unset($products);

            return $return;
        }


        public static function getAverageDeliveryPrice()
        {
            $sql = "select t1.SREDNA_DOST_CENA, t1.POS_NOMER
from dost_ceni t1
 inner join (
   select
    MAX(data) as t2Date, POS_NOMER as t2Nomer
    from dost_ceni
    
    group by dost_ceni.pos_nomer
) as t2 on t1.pos_nomer = t2.t2Nomer AND t1.data = t2.t2Date";


            return Services::firebird()->query($sql)->getResult();
        }


        public static function getProductGroups()
        {
            $products = self::getProducts();
            $return = array();

            foreach ($products as $key => $product) {

                $item = new \stdClass();
                $item->NOMER = $product->NOMER;
                $item->GRUPA_NOMER = $product->GRUPA_NOMER;
                $return[] = $item;
            }

            $products = null;
            unset($products);
            return $return;
        }

        public static function getProductsForTurnover()
        {
            $products = self::getProducts();
            $return = array();

            foreach ($products as $key => $product) {

                if ($product->IZKLUCHEN == 0 and $product->BEZNALICHEN == 0 and $product->MATERIAL == 0) {
                    $item = new \stdClass();
                    $item->NOMER = $product->NOMER;
                    $item->IME = $product->IME;
                    $return[] = $item;
                }
            }

            $products = null;
            unset($products);
            return $return;
        }


        public static function getProductsByCategoryID($categoryID)
        {
            $select[] = 'GRUPIPOS2.NOMER AS ProductBrandCode';
            $select[] = 'GRUPIPOS2.FULLNAME AS ProviderBrandName';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.IME AS ProductName';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.IME$1 AS ProductNameWebsite';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.IME$2 AS ProductNameWebsiteEN';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.OPISANIE_HTML AS ProductDescription';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.USER_FIELD_1 AS CatalogNumber';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.USER_FIELD_3 AS Label';
            $select[] = 'BARCODES.BARCODE_LIST AS Barcodes';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.NOMER AS ProductCode';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.USER_FIELD_4 AS SelmaticRank';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.GOL_OP_X AS SizeX';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.GOL_OP_Y AS SizeY';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.GOL_OP_Z AS SizeZ';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.GOL_OP_BRUTO AS Weight';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.USER_FIELD_6 AS Available';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.USER_FIELD_5 AS ProductCategoryCode';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.USER_FIELD_5 AS ExportWebsites';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.OSNOVEN_DOSTAVCHIK_NOMER AS DefaultProvider';
            $select[] = 'GRUPIPOS.GRUPIPOS_KOD AS CategoryGroupCode';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.DDS_PROC AS Vat';
            $select[] = 'POZICII.MIARKA_COEF AS SmallPackage';
            $select[] = 'MIARKI.MIARKA AS FirstMeasureName';
            $select[] = 'MIARKI2.MIARKA AS SecondMeasureName';


            return Services::firebird()
                ->table('POZICII')
                ->select(implode(',', $select))
                ->join('GRUPIPOS', 'GRUPIPOS.NOMER = POZICII.GRUPA_NOMER', 'LEFT')
                ->join('GRUPIPOS2', 'GRUPIPOS2.NOMER = POZICII.GRUPA_NOMER2', 'LEFT')
                ->join('MIARKI', 'MIARKI.NOMER = POZICII.MIARKA_NOMER', 'LEFT')
                ->join('MIARKI AS MIARKI2', 'MIARKI2.NOMER = POZICII.MIARKA_NOMER2', 'LEFT')
                ->join('(SELECT LIST(BARCODE_POSNOMER.BARCODE) AS BARCODE_LIST, POS_NOMER AS B_NOMER FROM BARCODE_POSNOMER GROUP BY POS_NOMER) AS BARCODES', 'BARCODES.B_NOMER = POZICII.NOMER', 'LEFT', false)
                ->groupStart()
                ->orLike('USER_FIELD_5', '1#' . $categoryID)
                ->orLike('USER_FIELD_5', '2#' . $categoryID)
                ->orLike('USER_FIELD_5', '12#' . $categoryID)
                ->groupEnd()
                ->where('IZKLUCHEN', 0)
                ->where('BEZNALICHEN', 0)
                ->get()
                ->getResult();
        }

        public static function getProductCategories()

        }


        public static function getProductDeliveryPrice($productID)

        public static function getOfferByID($offerID)

        // Неизпълнени оферти/заявки
        // TIP_OFERTA 2 - Заявка - Заявката е ангажиращ документ, с който в склада се "запазват" количествата от съответните артикули, като информацията за това какво е заявено е достъпна от съответните справки и е сравнима с текущо наличните количества.
        // STATUS 0 - Неизпълнена

        public static function getUnfulfilledRequest($startDate, $endDate, $storeID)
        {
            return self::singleton()->firebird
                ->table('OFERTI')
                ->select('OFERTI.NOMER, OFERTI_DE.POS_NOMER, OFERTI_DE.KOL')
                ->join('OFERTI_DE', 'OFERTI_DE.OFERTA_NOMER = OFERTI.NOMER', 'INNER')
                ->join('POZICII', 'POZICII.NOMER = OFERTI_DE.POS_NOMER')
                ->where('OFERTI.STATUS', 0)
                ->where('OFERTI.TIP_OFERTA ', 2)
                ->where('OFERTI.DATA >', $startDate)
                ->where('OFERTI.DATA <=', $endDate)
                ->where('OFERTI.OBEKT_NOMER', $storeID)
                ->where('POZICII.BEZNALICHEN', 0)
                ->where('POZICII.IZKLUCHEN', 0)
                ->where('POZICII.MATERIAL', 0)
                ->get()
                ->getResult();
        }


        // Продажби които са в склана и не са взети
        // STATUS_PRODAZBA 1 -  стоката е още в склада, не е взета от клиента
        // TIP 0 3 - Обикновена, По заявка
        public static function getUnPickedSales($startDate, $endDate, $storeID)
        {
            return Services::firebird()->table('PRODAZBI')
                ->select('PRODAZBI.NOMER, PRODAZBI_DE.POS_NOMER, PRODAZBI_DE.KOL')
                ->join('PRODAZBI_DE', 'PRODAZBI_DE.PRODAZBA_NOMER = PRODAZBI.NOMER', 'INNER')
                ->join('POZICII', 'POZICII.NOMER = PRODAZBI_DE.POS_NOMER')
                ->where('PRODAZBI.STATUS_PRODAZBA ', 1)
                ->where('PRODAZBI.ANULIRAN ', 0)
                ->where('PRODAZBI.DATA >', $startDate)
                ->where('PRODAZBI.DATA <=', $endDate)
                ->where('PRODAZBI.OBEKT_NOMER', $storeID)
                ->where('POZICII.BEZNALICHEN', 0)
                ->where('POZICII.IZKLUCHEN', 0)
                ->where('POZICII.MATERIAL', 0)
                ->groupStart()
                ->orWhere('PRODAZBI.TIP', 0)
                ->orWhere('PRODAZBI.TIP', 3)
                ->groupEnd()
                ->get()
                ->getResult();
        }


        //    STATUS
        //    0, Неизпълнена
        //    1, Изпълнена
        //    2, Отказана

        {
            return self::singleton()->firebird

                ->join('POZICII', 'POZICII.NOMER = ZAIAVKI_DE.POS_NOMER')
                ->where('ZAIAVKI.STATUS', 0)
                ->where('ZAIAVKI.DATA >', $startDate)
                ->where('ZAIAVKI.DATA <=', $endDate)
                ->where('ZAIAVKI.OBEKT_NOMER', $storeID)
                ->where('POZICII.BEZNALICHEN', 0)
                ->where('POZICII.IZKLUCHEN', 0)
                ->where('POZICII.MATERIAL', 0)
                ->get()
                ->getResult();
        }


        //    STATUS_DOSTAVKA

        public static function getSalesByObjectExcludingCompanies($startDate, $endDate, $storeID, $excludeCompanies = array())
        {
            $builder = self::singleton()->firebird->table('PRODAZBI')
                ->select('PRODAZBI_DE.POS_NOMER, OBEKT_NOMER, PRODAZBI_DE.KOL, DATA')
                ->join('PRODAZBI_DE', 'PRODAZBI_DE.PRODAZBA_NOMER = PRODAZBI.NOMER', 'INNER')
                ->where('PRODAZBI.STATUS_PRODAZBA IS NULL', NULL, NULL)
                ->where('PRODAZBI.DATA >', $startDate)
                ->where('PRODAZBI.DATA <=', $endDate)
                ->where('OBEKT_NOMER', $storeID);


            if (!empty($excludeCompanies)) {

                $excludeContragents = array_filter(array_unique(array_map('intval', explode(',', $excludeCompanies))));
                if (!empty($excludeContragents)) {
                    $builder->whereNotIn('PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_NOMER', $excludeContragents);
                }
            }
            return $builder->get()->getResult();

        }

        public static function getSalesRepresentative()
        {

                ->select('REF_KONTRAGENTI, LIST((CAST(IME as varchar(30000)) || \' - \' || CAST(STOINOST as varchar(30000))))')

                ->getResult();
        }

        public static function getSalesProductsBySaleIDs($sales)
        {


            $select = array(
                'PRODAZBI_DE.NOMER',
                'PRODAZBA_NOMER',
                'POS_NOMER',
                'POZICII.IME',
                'KOL',
                'TO_PROC',
                'MIARKA_NOMER',
                'ED_CENA',
                'ED_CENA_TO',
                'ED_CENA_S_DDS',
                'STOINOST_S_DDS',
                'STOINOST_BEZ_DDS',
                'GRUPIPOS.FULLNAME'
            );

            if (empty($sales)) {
                return array();
            }


            $result = Services::firebird()->table('PRODAZBI_DE')
                ->select(implode(',', $select))
                ->join('POZICII', 'PRODAZBI_DE.POS_NOMER = POZICII.NOMER')
                ->join('GRUPIPOS', 'GRUPIPOS.NOMER = POZICII.GRUPA_NOMER')
                ->whereIn('PRODAZBI_DE.PRODAZBA_NOMER', $sales)
                ->get()
                ->getResult();


            $return = array();
            foreach ($result as $item) {
                $return[$item->PRODAZBA_NOMER][] = $item;
            }
            return $return;

        }

        public static function getSaleProductsByOfferIDs($offersIDs)
        {
            return Services::firebird()->table('PRODAZBI')
                ->select('PRODAZBI.NOMER, PRODAZBI.STATUS_PRODAZBA,  PRODAZBI_DE.POS_NOMER, ED_CENA_TO, PRODAZBI_DE.DDS_PROC, PRODAZBI_DE.STOINOST_S_DDS,  PRODAZBI_DE.STOINOST_BEZ_DDS, KOL, METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER, POZICII.IME, PRODAZBI.CREATED_ON')
                ->join('PRODAZBI_DE', 'PRODAZBI.NOMER = PRODAZBI_DE.PRODAZBA_NOMER')
                ->join('POZICII', 'POZICII.NOMER = PRODAZBI_DE.POS_NOMER')
                ->whereIn('METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER', $offersIDs)
                ->where('PRODAZBI.STATUS_PRODAZBA IS NULL', false, false)
                ->orderBy('PRODAZBI.NOMER', 'DESC')
                ->orderBy('PRODAZBI_DE.POS_NOMER', 'DESC')
                ->get()
                ->getResult();
        }

        public static function getSelmaticTotals($offersIDs)
        {
            $dataResults = self::getSaleProductsByOfferIDs($offersIDs);

            $return = array();

            foreach ($dataResults as $dataResult) {
                $return[$dataResult->METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER]['NOMER'] = $dataResult->NOMER;
                $return[$dataResult->METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER]['METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER'] = $dataResult->METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER;
                $return[$dataResult->METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER]['STATUS_PRODAZBA'] = $dataResult->STATUS_PRODAZBA;
                $return[$dataResult->METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER]['PRODUCTS'][] = (object)array(
                    'PRODAZBA_NOMER'   => $dataResult->NOMER,
                    'STOINOST_S_DDS'   => $dataResult->STOINOST_S_DDS,
                    'STOINOST_BEZ_DDS' => $dataResult->STOINOST_BEZ_DDS,

                );

                @$return[$dataResult->METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER]['TOTAL_WITH_VAT'] += number_format($dataResult->STOINOST_S_DDS, 4, '.', '');
                @$return[$dataResult->METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER]['TOTAL_WITHOUT_VAT'] += number_format($dataResult->STOINOST_BEZ_DDS, 4, '.', '');

            }
            return $return;
        }

        public static function getSalesGetIncludedSales($sales)
        {
            $select = array(
                'PRODAZBI.NOMER AS NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_NOMER AS KONTRAGENT_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.PRIKLUCHEN AS PRIKLUCHEN',
                'PRODAZBI.FAKTURA_NOMER AS FAKTURA_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.FAKTURA_DATA AS FAKTURA_DATA',
                'PRODAZBI.NACHIN_PLASHTANE AS NACHIN_PLASHTANE',
                'PRODAZBI.SROK_NA_PLASHTANE AS SROK_NA_PLASHTANE',
                'PRODAZBI.SASTAVITEL AS SASTAVITEL',
                'PRODAZBI.SASTAVITEL_NOMER AS SASTAVITEL_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.STATUS_PRODAZBA AS STATUS_PRODAZBA',
                'PRODAZBI.METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER AS METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.KOMENTAR AS KOMENTAR',
                'KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.IME AS OBEKT_IME',
                'KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.ADRES AS ADRES',
                'KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.GRAD AS OBEKT_GRAD',
                'KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.MOL AS OBEKT_MOL',
                'KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.KONTRAGENT_NOMER AS KONTRAGENT_NOMER',
            );

            $sales = Services::firebird()->table('PRODAZBI')
                ->select(implode(',', $select))
                ->whereIn('PRODAZBI.NOMER', $sales)
                ->join('KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI', 'PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_OBEKT_NOMER = KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.NOMER', 'LEFT')
                ->where('PRODAZBI.PRIKLUCHEN', 1)
                ->get()
                ->getResult();


            return $sales;
        }

        public static function getInvoices($companyID)
        {
            $select = array(
                'PRODAZBI.NOMER AS NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_NOMER AS KONTRAGENT_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.PRIKLUCHEN AS PRIKLUCHEN',
                'PRODAZBI.FAKTURA_NOMER AS FAKTURA_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.FAKTURA_DATA AS FAKTURA_DATA',
                'PRODAZBI.NACHIN_PLASHTANE AS NACHIN_PLASHTANE',
                'PRODAZBI.SROK_NA_PLASHTANE AS SROK_NA_PLASHTANE',
                'PRODAZBI.SASTAVITEL AS SASTAVITEL',
                'PRODAZBI.SASTAVITEL_NOMER AS SASTAVITEL_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.STATUS_PRODAZBA AS STATUS_PRODAZBA',
                'PRODAZBI.METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER AS METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.KOMENTAR AS KOMENTAR',
                'KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.IME AS OBEKT_IME',
                'KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.ADRES AS ADRES',
                'KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.GRAD AS OBEKT_GRAD',
                'KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.MOL AS OBEKT_MOL',
                'KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.KONTRAGENT_NOMER AS KONTRAGENT_NOMER',
            );

            $masterIncludedSales = array();
            $includedSales = Services::firebird()->table('PRODAZBI')
                ->select(implode(',', $select))
                ->join('KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI', 'PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_OBEKT_NOMER = KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.NOMER', 'LEFT')
                ->where('PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_NOMER', $companyID)
                ->where('PRODAZBI.PRIKLUCHEN', 1)
                ->like('PRODAZBI.KOMENTAR', iconv('UTF-8', 'windows-1251', 'Включена в Продажба №'))
                ->orderBy('PRODAZBI.DATA_DAN', 'DESC')
                ->orderBy('PRODAZBI.METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER', 'ASC')
                ->get()
                ->getResult();

            foreach ($includedSales as $includedSale) {
                $matches = array();
                preg_match('/Включена в Продажба №.*?;/', $includedSale->KOMENTAR, $matches);
                if (!empty($matches)) {
                    $code = str_replace('Включена в Продажба №', '', $matches[0]);
                    $code = trim($code, ';');
                    $masterIncludedSales[$code][$includedSale->NOMER] = $includedSale;
                }
            }


            $invoices = Services::firebird()->table('PRODAZBI')
                ->select(implode(',', $select))
                ->join('KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI', 'PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_OBEKT_NOMER = KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI.NOMER', 'LEFT')
                ->where('PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_NOMER', $companyID)
                ->where('PRODAZBI.PRIKLUCHEN', 1)
                ->where('PRODAZBI.FAKTURA_NOMER IS NOT NULL', null, false)
                ->orderBy('PRODAZBI.DATA_DAN', 'DESC')
                ->orderBy('PRODAZBI.METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER', 'ASC')
                ->get()
                ->getResult();

            $reverse = array();
            foreach ($invoices as $laKey => $invoice) {

                $includedSaleIDs = array();
                $includedSales = array();
                if (strval($invoice->STATUS_PRODAZBA) === '') {
                    $includedSales[$invoice->NOMER] = current(self::getSalesGetIncludedSales([$invoice->NOMER]));
                    $includedSaleIDs[] = $invoice->NOMER;
                }


                if (isset($masterIncludedSales[$invoice->NOMER])) {
                    foreach ($masterIncludedSales[$invoice->NOMER] as $key => $masterIncludedSale) {
                        $includedSales[$key] = $masterIncludedSale;
                    }
                }

                if (empty($includedSales)) {
                    $invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER;
                    $reverseMatches = array();
                    preg_match('/Включва Продажби №.*?;/', $invoice->KOMENTAR, $reverseMatches);
                    if (!empty($reverseMatches)) {
                        $reverseCodes = str_replace('Включва Продажби №', '', $reverseMatches[0]);
                        $reverseCodes = trim($reverseCodes, ';');
                        $reverseCodes = explode(',', $reverseCodes);
                        echo '<pre>' . print_r($invoice, true) . '</pre>';
                        $reverseSales = self::getSalesGetIncludedSales($reverseCodes);
                        if (!empty($reverseSales)) {
                            foreach ($reverseSales as $reverseSale) {
                                $includedSales[$reverseSale->NOMER] = $reverseSale;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }

                $salesProducts = self::getSalesProductsBySaleIDs(array_keys($includedSales));

                $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Date'] = $invoice->FAKTURA_DATA;
                $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Company'] = $companyID;
                $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['TotalWithVat'] = 0;
                $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['TotalWithoutVat'] = 0;

                foreach ($includedSales as $includedSale) {

                    $website = 0;
                    $budget = null;
                    $userName = null;
                    $costs = null;
                    if ($includedSale->METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER) {
                        $websiteID = self::singleton()->db->table('orders')
                            ->select('orders.OrderID, BudgetName,order_account_snippets.Names, Costs')
                            ->where('OfferID', str_replace('99$', '', $includedSale->METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER))
                            ->join('order_account_snippets', 'order_account_snippets.OrderID = orders.OrderID')
                            ->join('hierarchy_budgets', 'hierarchy_budgets.HierarchyBudgetID = orders.HierarchyBudgetID', 'LEFT')
                            ->get()
                            ->getRow();
                        if ($websiteID) {
                            $website = $websiteID->OrderID;
                            $budget = $websiteID->BudgetName;
                            $userName = $websiteID->Names;
                            $costs = $websiteID->Costs;
                        }
                    }

                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['TotalWithVat'] = 0;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['TotalWithoutVat'] = 0;

                    $products = @$salesProducts[$includedSale->NOMER];

                    if (!empty($products)) {
                        foreach ($products as $product) {
                            $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['TotalWithVat'] += $product->STOINOST_S_DDS;
                            $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['TotalWithoutVat'] += $product->STOINOST_BEZ_DDS;
                            $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['TotalWithVat'] += $product->STOINOST_S_DDS;
                            $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['TotalWithoutVat'] += $product->STOINOST_BEZ_DDS;

                        }
                    }


                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['WebsiteSaleID'] = $website;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['BudgetName'] = $budget;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['UserName'] = $userName;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['Costs'] = $costs;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['FAKTURA_DATA'] = $includedSale->FAKTURA_DATA;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['FAKTURA_NOMER'] = $invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['NACHIN_PLASHTANE'] = $includedSale->NACHIN_PLASHTANE;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['SROK_NA_PLASHTANE'] = $includedSale->SROK_NA_PLASHTANE;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['SASTAVITEL'] = $includedSale->SASTAVITEL;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['SASTAVITEL_NOMER'] = $includedSale->SASTAVITEL_NOMER;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['OBEKT_GRAD'] = $includedSale->OBEKT_GRAD;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['OBEKT_MOL'] = $includedSale->OBEKT_MOL;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['OBEKT_IME'] = $includedSale->OBEKT_IME;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['ADRES'] = $includedSale->ADRES;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['sale_number'] = $includedSale->NOMER;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['metro'] = $includedSale->METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER;
                    $return[$invoice->FAKTURA_NOMER]['Sales'][$includedSale->NOMER]['products'] = $products;
                }


            }

            if (is_array($return) and !empty($return)) {
                foreach ($return as $laKey => $invoice) {
                    if (!isset($invoice['Sales'])) {
                        unset($return[$laKey]);
                    }
                }
            }

            return $return;
        }

        public static function getSalesByCompanyID($companyID, $saleID)
        {
            $select = array(
                'PRODAZBI.NOMER AS PRODAZBI_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.FAKTURA_NOMER AS PRODAZBI_FAKTURA_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.OBEKT_NOMER AS PRODAZBI_OBEKT_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.OFERTA_NOMER AS PRODAZBI_OFERTA_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.KOMENTAR AS PRODAZBI_KOMENTAR',
                'PRODAZBI.DATA AS PRODAZBI_DATA',
                'PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_IME',
                'PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_SEDALISHTE_ADRES',
                'PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_SEDALISHTE_GRAD',
                'PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_DANNOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_BULSTAT',
                'PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_DDSNOMER',
                'PRODAZBI.METRO_PORACHKA_NOMER'
            );

            $builder = Services::firebird()->table('PRODAZBI');
            $builder->select(implode(',', $select));
            $builder->where('PRODAZBI.KONTRAGENT_NOMER', $companyID);
            $builder->where('PRODAZBI.PRIKLUCHEN', 1);
            $builder->where('PRODAZBI.STATUS_PRODAZBA IS NULL', false, false);
            $builder->where('PRODAZBI.DATA >= ', date('Y-m-d', strtotime('-1 Year')));

            if ($saleID) {
                $builder->where('PRODAZBI.NOMER', $saleID);
            }
            $builder->orderBy('DATA', 'DESC');
            $sales = $builder->get()->getResult();

            return $sales;
        }

        public static function getSalesLines($salesIDs = array())
        {
            sort($salesIDs);

            $select = array(
                'PRODAZBI_DE.NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI_DE.PRODAZBA_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI_DE.POS_NOMER',
                'PRODAZBI_DE.KOL',
                'PRODAZBI_DE.ED_CENA',
                'PRODAZBI_DE.ED_CENA_TO',
                'PRODAZBI_DE.TO_PROC',
                'PRODAZBI_DE.ED_CENA_S_DDS',
                'PRODAZBI_DE.STOINOST_DDS',
                'PRODAZBI_DE.STOINOST_BEZ_DDS',
                'PRODAZBI_DE.STOINOST_S_DDS',
                'PRODAZBI_DE.DDS_PROC',
                'POZICII.IME',
                'MIARKI.MIARKA',
                'VALUTI.VALUTA',
            );


            $chunks = array_chunk($salesIDs, 100);

            $return = array();
            foreach ($chunks as $chunk) {

                $lines = Services::firebird()->table('PRODAZBI_DE')
                    ->select(implode(',', $select))
                    ->join('POZICII', 'PRODAZBI_DE.POS_NOMER = POZICII.NOMER')
                    ->join('MIARKI', 'MIARKI.NOMER = POZICII.MIARKA_NOMER')
                    ->join('VALUTI', 'VALUTI.NOMER = POZICII.VALUTA_NOMER')
                    ->whereIn('PRODAZBI_DE.PRODAZBA_NOMER', $chunk)
                    ->get()
                    ->getResult();


                foreach ($lines as $line) {
                    $line->ED_CENA = str_replace(',', '.', $line->ED_CENA);
                    $line->ED_CENA_TO = str_replace(',', '.', $line->ED_CENA_TO);
                    $line->ED_CENA_S_DDS = str_replace(',', '.', $line->ED_CENA_S_DDS);
                    $line->STOINOST_DDS = str_replace(',', '.', $line->STOINOST_DDS);
                    $line->STOINOST_BEZ_DDS = str_replace(',', '.', $line->STOINOST_BEZ_DDS);
                    $line->STOINOST_S_DDS = str_replace(',', '.', $line->STOINOST_S_DDS);

                    $return[$line->PRODAZBA_NOMER][] = $line;
                }
            }

            return $return;
        }

        public static function getOffersByCompanyID($companyID)
        {
            $inputOutput = array(
                'OFERTI_NOMER'     => 'OFERTI_NOMER',
                'OFERTI_KOMENTAR'  => 'OFERTI_KOMENTAR',
                'OFERTI_KOMENTAR2' => 'OFERTI_KOMENTAR2',
            );
            $select = array(
                'OFERTI.NOMER as OFERTI_NOMER',
                'OFERTI.KOMENTAR as OFERTI_KOMENTAR',
                'OFERTI.KOMENTAR2 as OFERTI_KOMENTAR2',
            );


            $builder = Services::firebird()->table('OFERTI');
            $builder->select(implode(',', $select));
            $builder->where('KONTRAGENT_NOMER', $companyID);
            $builder->where('OFERTI.DATA >= ', date('Y-m-d', strtotime('-1 Year')));
            $builder->orderBy('DATA', 'DESC');

            $offers = $builder->get()->getResult();
            $return = array();
            foreach ($offers as $offer) {
                $return[$offer->OFERTI_NOMER] = $offer;
            }
            $offers = NULL;
            unset($offers);

            return $return;

        }

        {

                'BULSTAT'             => 'BULSTAT',

                'KONTR_GRUPA_NOMER'   => 'KONTR_GRUPA_NOMER',
                'CENOVA_LISTA_NOMER'  => 'CENOVA_LISTA_NOMER',
                'TIP_CENA_NOMER'      => 'TIP_CENA_NOMER',
                'SEDALISHTE_ADRES'    => 'SEDALISHTE_ADRES',
                'SEDALISHTE_GRAD'     => 'SEDALISHTE_GRAD',

                'FACEBOOK'            => 'FACEBOOK',

                'KOMENTAR'            => 'KOMENTAR',

                'KONTRAGENTI.SEDALISHTE_EMAIL',
                'KONTRAGENTI.KORESP_ADRES',
                'KONTRAGENTI.KORESP_GRAD',
                'KONTRAGENTI.TIP_CENA_NOMER2',
                'KONTRAGENTI.TIP_CENA_NOMER3',
                'KONTRAGENTI.SEDALISHTE_POST_KOD',
                'KONTRAGENTI.KORESP_POST_KOD',
                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.NOMER KL_NOMER',
                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.IME',
                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.DLAZNOST',
                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.TEL',
                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.TEL2',
                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.TEL3',
                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.MOBILEN_TEL',
                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.MOBILEN_TEL2',
                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.MOBILEN_TEL3',

                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.SKYPE',
                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.FACEBOOK',
                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.ROZDENA_DATA',

                'KONTRAGENTI_LICA.PASSWRD',
                'KONTRAGENTI.NACHIN_PLASHTANE K_NACHIN_PLASHTANE'
            );


            $builder = Services::firebird()->table('KONTRAGENTI_LICA')
                ->select(implode(', ', $select))
                ->join('KONTRAGENTI', 'KONTRAGENTI.NOMER = KONTRAGENTI_LICA.KONTRAGENT_NOMER', 'LEFT')
                ->where('UPPER(KONTRAGENTI_LICA.EMAIL)', strtoupper($email));


            if ($password) {
                $builder->where('KONTRAGENTI_LICA.PASSWRD', $password);
            }


            return $builder->get()->getRow();
        }


        public static function getPriceListsProducts($priceList, $priceType)
        {
            $query = "SELECT CENA,TIP_CENA_NOMER,CENOVA_LISTA_NOMER, NOMER, USER_FIELD_5    
            from get_ceni_cenovi_listi(current_date, null, '={$priceList}', null, null, '={$priceType}') gc 
            join pozicii pz on gc.pos_nomer = pz.nomer 
                WHERE pz.nomer > -1 AND IZKLUCHEN = 0 AND BEZNALICHEN = 0 AND (USER_FIELD_5 starting with '1#' OR USER_FIELD_5 starting with '12#' OR USER_FIELD_5 starting with '2#') order by pz.ime ";
            return Services::firebird()->query($query)->getResult();
        }


        public static function getRetailPrices()
        {

            if (!$return = cache('getRetailPrices')) {
                $query = "SELECT POS_NOMER, TIP_CENA_NOMER, CENOVA_LISTA_NOMER, CENA from get_ceni_cenovi_listi(current_date, null, '=2', null, null, '=4') gc";
                $return = Services::firebird()->query($query)->getResult();
                cache()->save('test', $return, 3600);
            }
            return $return;
        }


        public static function getRetailPricesWithProductsForImport()
        {
            $cacheName = 'ErpUtils_getRetailPricesWithProductsForImport';
            if (!$return = cache($cacheName)) {

                $query = "SELECT CENA,TIP_CENA_NOMER,CENOVA_LISTA_NOMER, NOMER, USER_FIELD_5    
            from get_ceni_cenovi_listi(current_date, null, '=2', null, null, '=4') gc 
            join pozicii pz on gc.pos_nomer = pz.nomer 
                WHERE pz.nomer > -1 AND IZKLUCHEN = 0 AND BEZNALICHEN = 0 AND (USER_FIELD_5 starting with '1#' OR USER_FIELD_5 starting with '12#') order by pz.ime ";
                $return = Services::firebird()->query($query)->getResult();
                cache()->save('test', $return, 3600);

            }

            return $return;
        }


        public static function getFranchisePriceWithProductsForImport()
        {

            $cacheName = 'ErpUtils_getWholesalePriceWithProductsForImport';
            if (!$return = cache($cacheName)) {
