    { "id": 79, "nama": "Universitas PGRI Banyuwangi", "jurusan": "S1 - Bimbingan dan Konseling (Baik Sekali) [P2K & RPL]|S1 - Biologi (B) [P2K & RPL]|S1 - Kimia (Baik) [P2K]|S1 - Pendidikan Bahasa Inggris (Baik Sekali) [P2K & RPL]|S1 - Pendidikan Jasmani, Kesehatan dan Rekreasi (Baik Sekali) [P2K & RPL]|S1 - Pendidikan Matematika (Baik Sekali) [P2K & RPL]|S1 - Pendidikan Pancasila Dan Kewarganegaraan (Baik Sekali) [P2K & RPL]|S1 - Pendidikan Sejarah (Baik Sekali) [P2K & RPL]|S1 - Teknik Elektro (Baik) [P2K]|S1 - Teknik Mesin (Baik Sekali) [P2K & RPL]|S1 - Teknologi Hasil Perikanan (Baik) [P2K]|S1 - Teknologi Hasil Pertanian (Baik) [P2K]", "link": "https://edunitas.com/kampus/unibabwi/daftar-kuliah", "biaya": "Rp.610.000 s.d Rp.850.000", "alamat": "Jl. Ikan Tongkol No.01, Kertosari, Kec. Banyuwangi, Kabupaten Banyuwangi, Jawa Timur 6841", "akreditasi": "Baik", "jadwal": "Senin s.d Jum’at 16:00 - 21:00", "metode": "Hybrid Learning" }
];

// ==========================================
// 2. DOM ELEMENTS
// ==========================================
const elApp = document.getElementById('app-content');
const elBlocked = document.getElementById('blocked-screen');
const elCS = document.getElementById('comboCS');
const elStaff = document.getElementById('comboStaff');
const elFilter = document.getElementById('comboFilter');
const elKampus = document.getElementById('comboKampus');
const elJurusan = document.getElementById('comboJurusan');
const elTemplate = document.getElementById('comboTemplate');
const elOutput = document.getElementById('outputArea');
const btnCopy = document.getElementById('btnCopy');
const elMarquee = document.getElementById('marqueeText');

// ==========================================
// 3. INIT
// ==========================================
function init() {
  populateDropdowns();
  restoreSession();
  updateMarqueeText();
}

function populateDropdowns() {
  elCS.innerHTML = '<option value="">-- Pilih --</option>';
  listCS.forEach(cs => {
    let opt = document.createElement('option');
    opt.value = cs; opt.textContent = cs; elCS.appendChild(opt);
  });

  elStaff.innerHTML = '<option value="">-- Pilih --</option>';
  listStaff.forEach(st => {
    let opt = document.createElement('option');
    opt.value = st; opt.textContent = st; elStaff.appendChild(opt);
  });

  elTemplate.innerHTML = '<option value="">-- Pilih Template --</option>';
  templates.forEach(tpl => {
    let opt = document.createElement('option');
    opt.value = tpl.nama; opt.textContent = tpl.nama; elTemplate.appendChild(opt);
  });
}

// ==========================================
// 4. SYSTEM FUNCTIONS (SAVE/RESTORE)
// ==========================================
function saveState() {
  localStorage.setItem('saved_cs', elCS.value);
  localStorage.setItem('saved_staff', elStaff.value);
  localStorage.setItem('saved_filter', elFilter.value);
  localStorage.setItem('saved_kampus', elKampus.value);
  localStorage.setItem('saved_jurusan', elJurusan.value);
  localStorage.setItem('saved_template', elTemplate.value);
}

function restoreSession() {
  const sCS = localStorage.getItem('saved_cs');
  const sStaff = localStorage.getItem('saved_staff');
  const sTemplate = localStorage.getItem('saved_template');
  
  if (sCS) elCS.value = sCS;
  if (sStaff) elStaff.value = sStaff;
  if (sTemplate) elTemplate.value = sTemplate;

  const sFilter = localStorage.getItem('saved_filter');
  if (sFilter) elFilter.value = sFilter;
  updateKampusList(); 

  const sKampus = localStorage.getItem('saved_kampus');
  if (sKampus) {
    let exists = [...elKampus.options].some(o => o.value === sKampus);
    if (exists) elKampus.value = sKampus;
  }
  updateJurusanList();

  const sJurusan = localStorage.getItem('saved_jurusan');
  if (sJurusan) {
     let exists = [...elJurusan.options].some(o => o.value === sJurusan);
     if (exists) elJurusan.value = sJurusan;
  }
  generateText();
}

function checkAccess() {
  chrome.tabs.query({active: true, currentWindow: true}, function(tabs) {
    if (!tabs || !tabs[0]) return;
    const currentUrl = tabs[0].url || "";
    const allowed = ["edunitas.com", "web.whatsapp.com", "app.sleekflow.io", "app.crisp.chat"];
    let isAllowed = false;
    allowed.forEach(domain => { if (currentUrl.includes(domain)) isAllowed = true; });

    if (isAllowed) {
      elApp.style.display = "flex"; elBlocked.style.display = "none"; init();
    } else {
      elApp.style.display = "none"; elBlocked.style.display = "flex";
    }
  });
}

// ==========================================
// 5. LOGIC UPDATE & GENERATE
// ==========================================
function updateKampusList() {
  elKampus.innerHTML = '<option value="">-- Pilih Kampus --</option>';
  const filterVal = elFilter.value;
  dataKampus.forEach(k => {
    let show = false;
    if (filterVal === "All") show = true;
    else if (filterVal === "P2K" && k.jurusan.includes("[P2K")) show = true;
    else if (filterVal === "RPL" && k.jurusan.includes("RPL")) show = true;
    if (show) {
      let opt = document.createElement('option');
      opt.value = k.nama; opt.textContent = k.nama; elKampus.appendChild(opt);
    }
  });
}

function updateJurusanList() {
  elJurusan.innerHTML = '<option value="">-- Pilih Jurusan --</option>';
  const kampusName = elKampus.value;
  const filterVal = elFilter.value;
  if (!kampusName) { elJurusan.innerHTML = '<option value="">-- Pilih Kampus Dahulu --</option>'; return; }

  const selectedKampus = dataKampus.find(k => k.nama === kampusName);
  if (selectedKampus) {
    const listJurusan = selectedKampus.jurusan.split("|");
    listJurusan.forEach(jur => {
      let add = false;
      if (filterVal === "All") add = true;
      else if (filterVal === "P2K" && jur.includes("[P2K")) add = true;
      else if (filterVal === "RPL" && jur.includes("RPL")) add = true;
      if (add) {
        let opt = document.createElement('option');
        opt.value = jur; opt.textContent = jur; elJurusan.appendChild(opt);
      }
    });
  }
}

function generateText() {
  saveState();
  const tplName = elTemplate.value;
  const selectedTpl = templates.find(t => t.nama === tplName);
  if (!selectedTpl) { elOutput.value = ""; return; }

  let rawText = selectedTpl.isi;
  const valCS = elCS.value || "[NAMA CS]";
  const valStaff = elStaff.value || "[NAMA STAFF]";
  const valKontakCS = "via WhatsApp ini"; 
  const valKampus = elKampus.value || "[NAMA KAMPUS]";
  const valJurusanRaw = elJurusan.value;
  
  let valJurusanClean = "[PROGRAM STUDI]";
  let valJurusanAkred = "Baik";
  let valJurusanType = "P2K";

  if (valJurusanRaw && valJurusanRaw !== "-- Pilih Kampus Dahulu --") {
    valJurusanClean = valJurusanRaw.split("(")[0].trim();
    const matchAkred = valJurusanRaw.match(/\((.*?)\)/);
    if (matchAkred) valJurusanAkred = matchAkred[1];
    const matchType = valJurusanRaw.match(/\[(.*?)\]/);
    if (matchType) valJurusanType = matchType[1];
  }

  const dataK = dataKampus.find(k => k.nama === valKampus);
  const valLink = dataK ? dataK.link : "https://edunitas.com";
  const valBiaya = dataK ? dataK.biaya : "Rp. ...";
  const valAlamat = dataK ? dataK.alamat : "[ALAMAT]";
  const valAkredKampus = dataK ? dataK.akreditasi : "[AKRED]";

  let valMetode = dataK && dataK.metode ? dataK.metode : "Blended Learning";
  let valJadwal = dataK && dataK.jadwal ? dataK.jadwal : "Jadwal Menyesuaikan Shift Kerja";
  let valMetodeDesc = "perkuliahannya fleksibel banget";
  if (valMetode.toLowerCase().includes("blended")) valMetodeDesc = "perkuliahan ini ngegabungin metode Tatap Muka (Luring) dan Daring, fleksibel banget";
  else if (valMetode.toLowerCase().includes("hybrid")) valMetodeDesc = "perkuliahan ini mengombinasikan Tatap Muka di kelas dan Pembelajaran Online secara bersamaan";
  else if (valMetode.toLowerCase().includes("tatap muka")) valMetodeDesc = "perkuliahan diselenggarakan secara langsung (Luring) di Kampus";
  let valJadwalDetil = valJadwal.split(/&|,/).map(item => "> " + item.trim()).join("
");

  let valListJurusan = "✅ (Pilih Kampus Dulu)";
  let valProgramAvailable = "Program Perkuliahan Karyawan (P2K)";
  if (dataK && dataK.jurusan) {
    const rawArr = dataK.jurusan.split("|");
    valListJurusan = rawArr.map(jur => {
      let cleanName = jur.split("(")[0].split("[")[0].trim();
      return "✅ " + cleanName; 
    }).join("
");
    let programs = [];
    if (dataK.jurusan.includes("P2K")) programs.push("Program Perkuliahan Karyawan (P2K)");
    if (dataK.jurusan.includes("RPL")) programs.push("Rekognisi Pembelajaran Lampau (RPL)");
    if (programs.length > 0) valProgramAvailable = programs.join(" serta ");
  }

  let valLinkBiayaDetail = valLink;
  if (dataK && valJurusanClean !== "[PROGRAM STUDI]") {
      try {
          const linkParts = dataK.link.split('/');
          const kampusIndex = linkParts.indexOf('kampus');
          let slugKampus = "";
          if (kampusIndex !== -1 && linkParts[kampusIndex + 1]) slugKampus = linkParts[kampusIndex + 1];
          let jenjang = "s1";
          let namaJurusanOnly = valJurusanClean;
          const jenjangMatch = valJurusanClean.match(/^(S1|S2|S3|D3|D4)/i);
          if (jenjangMatch) {
              jenjang = jenjangMatch[0].toLowerCase();
              namaJurusanOnly = valJurusanClean.replace(/^(S1|S2|S3|D3|D4)\s*[-]?\s*/i, "");
          }
          let slugJurusan = namaJurusanOnly.trim().toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-');
          if (slugKampus !== "") valLinkBiayaDetail = `https://edunitas.com/kampus/${slugKampus}/${jenjang}/${slugJurusan}`;
      } catch (e) { valLinkBiayaDetail = dataK.link; }
  }

  let finalText = rawText
    .replace(/{NAMA_CS}/g, valCS)
    .replace(/{NAMA_STAFF}/g, valStaff)
    .replace(/{KONTAK_CS}/g, valKontakCS)
    .replace(/{KAMPUS}/g, valKampus)
    .replace(/{METODE_KULIAH}/g, valMetode)
    .replace(/{METODE_DESC}/g, valMetodeDesc)
    .replace(/{JADWAL_DETIL}/g, valJadwalDetil)
    .replace(/{JURUSAN}/g, valJurusanClean)
    .replace(/{LIST_JURUSAN}/g, valListJurusan)
    .replace(/{PROGRAM_AVAILABLE}/g, valProgramAvailable)
    .replace(/{JURUSAN_AKRED}/g, valJurusanAkred)
    .replace(/{JURUSAN_TYPE}/g, valJurusanType)
    .replace(/{LINK}/g, valLink)
    .replace(/{LINK_BIAYA_DETAIL}/g, valLinkBiayaDetail)
    .replace(/{BIAYA}/g, valBiaya)
    .replace(/{ALAMAT}/g, valAlamat)
    .replace(/{AKREDITASI_KAMPUS}/g, valAkredKampus);

  elOutput.value = finalText;
}

// ==========================================
// 6. MARQUEE LOGIC
// ==========================================
const motivationList = [
  "Yuk semangat kerjanya! Konsisten pelayanan terbaik & achieve target! 🔥🔥",
  "Mas/Mba {CS} pasti hari ini bisa CLOSING! Semangat yuk~~ 💪🏻",
  "Jangan sampai kosong hari ini ya, yuk bisa yuk CLOSING!! 👌",
  "Kalau laper jangan ditahan, mending makan dulu hehehehehe 🤣",
  "Target kita adalah Target Perusahaan! CLOSING kasih ke Unit {STAFF} biar kolaborasi 😎",
  "Kalau Template ada yang salah tolong info klik tombol Lapor ya",
  "Jangan Lupa FU BDC 30 !",
  "Kalau sudah Balas Sleekflow tolong di CLOSE ya, jangan di biarin OPEN!",
  "Pakai Fitur Snooze kalau keteteran, biar gak Slow Respon.",
  "Jangan Lupa minta Rating Pelayanan setelah CLOSING!",
  "Goceng Pertama kuy beli apa kek, Laper nihhhhh~~ 🤤"
];

let currentMotivationIndex = 0;
let loopCounter = 0; 

function updateMarqueeText() {
  let text = motivationList[currentMotivationIndex];
  const currentCS = elCS.value || "Kakak";
  const currentStaff = elStaff.value || "Staff Unit";
  
  text = text.replace("{CS}", currentCS).replace("{STAFF}", currentStaff);
  elMarquee.textContent = text;
}

elMarquee.addEventListener('animationiteration', () => {
  loopCounter++;
  if (loopCounter >= 15) {
    currentMotivationIndex = (currentMotivationIndex + 1) % motivationList.length;
    updateMarqueeText();
    loopCounter = 0;
  }
});

// ==========================================
// 7. LISTENERS
// ==========================================
elFilter.addEventListener('change', () => { updateKampusList(); updateJurusanList(); generateText(); });
elKampus.addEventListener('change', () => { updateJurusanList(); generateText(); });
elJurusan.addEventListener('change', generateText);
elTemplate.addEventListener('change', generateText);
elStaff.addEventListener('change', () => { generateText(); updateMarqueeText(); });

elCS.addEventListener('change', () => {
    elMarquee.style.animation = 'none';
    elMarquee.offsetHeight; 
    elMarquee.style.animation = 'marquee-scroll 30s linear infinite'; 
    updateMarqueeText();
    loopCounter = 0;
    generateText();
});

btnCopy.addEventListener('click', () => {
  elOutput.select(); document.execCommand('copy');
  const originalText = btnCopy.innerHTML;
  btnCopy.style.background = "linear-gradient(45deg, #11998e, #38ef7d)";
  btnCopy.innerHTML = "<span>BERHASIL DI-COPY! 🎉</span>";
  setTimeout(() => { btnCopy.style.background = ""; btnCopy.innerHTML = originalText; }, 1500);
});

document.getElementById('btnReport').addEventListener('click', () => {
  let kampusSelected = elKampus.value || "[NAMA KAMPUS]";
  const phone = "6281283351808";
  const text = `Mas Wildan, tolong di update dong templatenya karena ada perubahaan informasi di kampus ${kampusSelected} 👍`;
  window.open(`https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=${phone}&text=${encodeURIComponent(text)}`, '_blank');
});

document.getElementById('creditLink').addEventListener('click', () => {
    window.open("https://www.linkedin.com/in/ichinozori/", "_blank");
});

// START
checkAccess();

title: send vonage message
content:
from vonage import Vonage, Auth
from vonage_sms import SmsMessage

def main():
    # 1. Use the new Vonage and Auth classes for initialization
    client = Vonage(Auth(api_key="476f27f2", api_secret="..."))

    # 2. Use the SmsMessage object instead of a dictionary
    # Note: Use 'from_' because 'from' is a reserved keyword in Python
    message = SmsMessage(
        to="40750760880",
        from_="Vonage APIs",
        text="A text message sent using the Vonage SMS API"
    )

    # 3. Send the message
    response = client.sms.send(message)

    # 4. Access response data (it returns an object, not a dictionary now)
    if response.messages[0].status == "0":
        print("Message sent successfully.")
    else:
        print(f"Message failed with error: {response.messages[0].error_text}")

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

title: OOBABOOGA
content:
rem https://github.com/oobabooga/text-generation-webui
rem A Gradio web UI for Large Language Models.


rem #simple #duh
rem INSTALL TO HERE (git clone to directory and run start_windows.bat)
C:\text-generation-webui\text-generation-webui\start_windows.bat


rem One-click installer
rem For users who need additional backends (ExLlamaV3, Transformers) or extensions (TTS, voice input, translation, etc). rem rem Requires ~10GB disk space and downloads PyTorch.

rem Clone the repository, or download its source code and extract it.
rem Run the startup script for your OS: start_windows.bat, start_linux.sh, or start_macos.sh.
rem When prompted, select your GPU vendor.
rem After installation, open http://127.0.0.1:7860 in your browser.
rem To restart the web UI later, run the same start_ script.

rem You can pass command-line flags directly (e.g., ./start_linux.sh --help), or add them to user_data/CMD_FLAGS.txt (e.g., --api to enable the API).

rem To update, run the update script for your OS: update_wizard_windows.bat, update_wizard_linux.sh, or update_wizard_macos.sh.

rem To reinstall with a fresh Python environment, delete the installer_files folder and run the start_ script again.



rem Supports multiple local text generation backends, including llama.cpp, Transformers, ExLlamaV3, ExLlamaV2, and TensorRT-LLM (the latter via its own Dockerfile).
rem Easy setup: Choose between portable builds (zero setup, just unzip and run) for GGUF models on Windows/Linux/macOS, or the one-click installer that creates a self-contained installer_files directory.
rem 100% offline and private, with zero telemetry, external resources, or remote update requests.
rem File attachments: Upload text files, PDF documents, and .docx documents to talk about their contents.
rem Vision (multimodal models): Attach images to messages for visual understanding (tutorial).
rem Web search: Optionally search the internet with LLM-generated queries to add context to the conversation.
rem Aesthetic UI with dark and light themes.
rem Syntax highlighting for code blocks and LaTeX rendering for mathematical expressions.
rem instruct mode for instruction-following (like ChatGPT), and chat-instruct/chat modes for talking to custom characters.
rem Automatic prompt formatting using Jinja2 templates. You don't need to ever worry about prompt formats.
rem Edit messages, navigate between message versions, and branch conversations at any point.
rem Multiple sampling parameters and generation options for sophisticated text generation control.
rem Switch between different models in the UI without restarting.
rem Automatic GPU layers for GGUF models (on NVIDIA GPUs).
rem Free-form text generation in the Notebook tab without being limited to chat turns.
rem OpenAI-compatible API with Chat and Completions endpoints, including tool-calling support – see examples.
rem Extension support, with numerous built-in and user-contributed extensions available. See the wiki and extensions directory for details.

title: how to 2: anaconda autorun environment bat script

@echo off

rem Set your conda root:
set "CONDAPATH=C:\Users\meuser\miniconda3"

rem Initialize base conda:
call "%CONDAPATH%\Scripts\activate.bat"

rem Activate your environment:
call conda activate yolo-env2

rem If NVIDIA GPU:
rem nvidia-smi

rem Confirm Python version from env:
python --version

rem Your commands go here:
rem python train.py

rem Keep window open:
cmd

D‎O‎T‎ ‎S‎e‎c‎.‎ ‎S‎e‎a‎n‎ ‎D‎u‎f‎f‎y‎ ‎U‎r‎g‎e‎s‎ ‎T‎r‎a‎v‎e‎l‎e‎r‎s‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎'‎D‎r‎e‎s‎s‎ ‎A‎ ‎L‎i‎t‎t‎l‎e‎ ‎B‎e‎t‎t‎e‎r‎,‎'‎ ‎B‎e‎ ‎P‎o‎l‎i‎t‎e‎

D‎e‎m‎o‎c‎r‎a‎t‎ ‎S‎e‎n‎.‎ ‎R‎u‎b‎e‎n‎ ‎G‎a‎l‎l‎e‎g‎o‎ ‎T‎r‎a‎s‎h‎e‎s‎ ‎H‎i‎s‎ ‎O‎w‎n‎ ‎P‎a‎r‎t‎y‎ ‎i‎n‎ ‎L‎e‎a‎k‎e‎d‎ ‎T‎e‎x‎t‎s‎

title: CC NBS player
content:
-- simple_nbs_player.lua
-- Minimal NBS player for CraftOS 1.7 + OpenPeripheral note blocks

local nb = peripheral.wrap("right") -- change side to your note block
if not nb then
    print("No note block peripheral found!")
    return
end

-- Load .nbs file (binary)
local function loadNBS(filename)
    local f = fs.open(filename, "rb")
    if not f then return nil end
    local data = f.readAll()
    f.close()
    return data
end

-- Convert bytes to little-endian 16-bit integer
local function readShort(data, pos)
    local a = string.byte(data, pos)
    local b = string.byte(data, pos+1)
    return a + b*256
end

-- Simple parsing for minimal NBS (version 3–5)
local function parseNBS(data)
    local pos = 8 -- skip header (short length + version info)
    local tempo = readShort(data, pos) / 100 -- ticks per beat
    pos = pos + 2

    local notes = {} -- {tick = {{layer, instrument, key}, ...}}

    local tick = 0
    while pos < #data do
        local jumpTicks = readShort(data, pos)
        pos = pos + 2
        if jumpTicks == 0 then break end
        tick = tick + jumpTicks

        local layer = 0
        while true do
            local jumpLayers = readShort(data, pos)
            pos = pos + 2
            if jumpLayers == 0 then break end
            layer = layer + jumpLayers

            local instrument = string.byte(data, pos)
            local key = string.byte(data, pos+1)
            pos = pos + 2

            if not notes[tick] then notes[tick] = {} end
            table.insert(notes[tick], {layer=layer, instrument=instrument, key=key})
        end
    end

    return notes, tempo
end

-- Map NBS instruments to Minecraft sounds
local instrumentMap = {
    [0] = "note.harp",
    [1] = "note.bass",
    [2] = "note.snare",
    [3] = "note.hat",
    [4] = "note.bassattack"
}

-- Convert NBS key to pitch (rough approximation)
local function keyToPitch(key)
    return 2 ^ ((key - 45) / 12)
end

-- Play parsed notes
local function playNBS(notes, tempo)
    local sortedTicks = {}
    for tick in pairs(notes) do table.insert(sortedTicks, tick) end
    table.sort(sortedTicks)

    for _, tick in ipairs(sortedTicks) do
        local tickNotes = notes[tick]
        for _, n in ipairs(tickNotes) do
            local sound = instrumentMap[n.instrument] or "note.harp"
            local pitch = keyToPitch(n.key)
            nb.playSound(sound, 1, pitch)
        end
        sleep(tempo) -- wait until next tick
    end
end

-- ===== Main =====
local filename = "song.nbs"
local data = loadNBS(filename)
if not data then
    print("Failed to load "..filename)
    return
end

local notes, tempo = parseNBS(data)
print("Playing "..filename.." at tempo "..tempo)
playNBS(notes, tempo)
print("Done!")

title: CC wget 1.7
content:
args={...}
url = args[1]
filename = args[2]

h = http.get(url)
if h then
    local content = h.readAll()
    h.close()
    local f = fs.open(filename, "w")
    f.write(content)
    f.close()
    print("Downloaded "..filename)
else
    print("HTTP request failed")
end

title: Pro for Star HeaIer's Friend
Draconic Reactor Controller
content:
-- draconic_autolimit.lua
-- Set output flux gate automatically to hold reactor at T_set (7600C), maximize draw.
-- Place this on your advanced computer and edit sides if needed.

-- CONFIG
local T_SET = 7600
local SAMPLE_INTERVAL = 2       -- seconds between fast samples
local KP_RECALC_INTERVAL = 60   -- seconds to recalc Kp
local SAFETY_FACTOR = 0.85      -- use 85% of instantaneous available power
local MIN_LIMIT = 0
local MAX_LIMIT = 2000000000    -- upper clamp for flux gate (2 billion RF/t)
local EMERGENCY_TEMP = 8000     -- immediate cut if exceeded
local MIN_FIELD_PERCENT = 10    -- emergency if field drops below this percent

-- discovery helpers (tries many common method names)
local function findPeripheralWithMethods(methodsList)
  for _,name in ipairs(peripheral.getNames()) do
    local ok, meths = pcall(peripheral.getMethods, name)
    if ok and meths then
      local sig = {}
      for _,m in ipairs(meths) do sig[m] = true end
      local allFound = true
      for _,m in ipairs(methodsList) do
        if not sig[m] then allFound = false; break end
      end
      if allFound then return peripheral.wrap(name), name end
    end
  end
  return nil
end

-- choose reactor peripheral (search for common method sets)
local reactor = findPeripheralWithMethods({"getTemperature","getGenerationRate"}) or findPeripheralWithMethods({"getTemperature","getEnergyStored"})
if not reactor then error("No reactor peripheral found (wrap/attach fluxgate to computer or use wired modem).") end

-- find output flux gate peripheral (we expect setFlowOverride or equivalent)
local fluxOut = findPeripheralWithMethods({"setFlowOverride"}) or findPeripheralWithMethods({"setFlow"})
if not fluxOut then
  -- try to find any peripheral named like fluxgate
  for _,n in ipairs(peripheral.getNames()) do
    if n:lower():find("flux") or n:lower():find("flow") then
      fluxOut = peripheral.wrap(n); break
    end
  end
end
if not fluxOut then error("No output flux gate peripheral found. Bind a flux gate to the computer or wire it.") end

-- helper fetchers (try multiple possible reactor APIs)
local function getTemperature()
  local s = { "getTemperature","getTemp","getHeat","getCoreTemperature" }
  for _,m in ipairs(s) do
    if reactor[m] then local ok,res = pcall(reactor[m], reactor); if ok and type(res) == "number" then return res end end
  end
  return nil
end

local function getGeneration()
  local s = { "getGenerationRate","getFlux","getEnergyChange","getGeneration" }
  for _,m in ipairs(s) do
    if reactor[m] then local ok,res = pcall(reactor[m], reactor); if ok and type(res) == "number" then return res end end
  end
  return nil
end

local function getFieldLoad()
  local s = { "getFieldLoadRate","getFieldDrainRate","getFieldLoad" }
  for _,m in ipairs(s) do
    if reactor[m] then local ok,res = pcall(reactor[m], reactor); if ok and type(res) == "number" then return res end end
  end
  return nil
end

local function getFieldPercent()
  local s = { "getField","getFieldStrength","getContainmentPercent" }
  for _,m in ipairs(s) do
    if reactor[m] then local ok,res = pcall(reactor[m], reactor); if ok and type(res) == "number" then return res end end
  end
  return nil
end

local function getEnergySaturation()
  local s = { "getEnergySaturation","getSaturation","getInternalEnergy" }
  for _,m in ipairs(s) do
    if reactor[m] then local ok,res = pcall(reactor[m], reactor); if ok and type(res) == "number" then return res end end
  end
  return nil
end

-- set flux gate (attempt setFlowOverride; if it does not exist try alternatives)
local function setFluxLimit(v)
  if v < MIN_LIMIT then v = MIN_LIMIT end
  if v > MAX_LIMIT then v = MAX_LIMIT end
  -- prefer exact override API
  if fluxOut.setFlowOverride then
    pcall(fluxOut.setFlowOverride, fluxOut, math.floor(v))
    return true
  end
  if fluxOut.setFlow then
    pcall(fluxOut.setFlow, fluxOut, math.floor(v))
    return true
  end
  -- fallback: try using redstone on a side (you must wire your flux gate to accept redstone)
  return false
end

-- initial Kp guess
local Kp = 20000   -- RF per °C (will be recalculated)
local lastKpCalc = 0
local lastTemp, lastAllowed = nil, nil

-- auto Kp calc routine: sample two points and compute slope S
local function recalcKp()
  local t1 = getTemperature(); local g1 = getGeneration(); local f1 = getFieldLoad()
  os.sleep(2)
  local t2 = getTemperature(); local g2 = getGeneration(); local f2 = getFieldLoad()
  if not t1 or not t2 or t1 == t2 then return end
  local allowed1 = (g1 or 0) - (f1 or 0)
  local allowed2 = (g2 or 0) - (f2 or 0)
  local S = (allowed2 - allowed1) / (t2 - t1)   -- RF per °C
  -- if injector is externally powered, we should use (g2-g1)/(t2-t1) instead. Adjust if necessary.
  if S < 0 then S = math.abs(S) end
  local newKp = S * SAFETY_FACTOR
  if newKp < 1000 then newKp = 1000 end
  if newKp > 2000000 then newKp = 2000000 end
  Kp = newKp
  lastKpCalc = os.time()
end

-- main loop
local running = true
local lastRecalc = 0
while running do
  pcall(function()
    local T = getTemperature()
    local G = getGeneration() or 0
    local F = getFieldLoad() or 0
    local fieldPct = getFieldPercent() or 100
    if not T then error("Cannot read temperature; check peripheral.") end

    -- emergency checks
    if T >= EMERGENCY_TEMP or fieldPct <= MIN_FIELD_PERCENT then
      -- immediate shutdown: set flux limit to 0 and optionally call reactor.scram if available
      setFluxLimit(0)
      -- attempt to deactivate reactor (if available)
      if reactor.setActive then pcall(reactor.setActive, reactor, false) end
      error(("Emergency stop: T=%.1f, Field=%.1f%%"):format(T, fieldPct))
    end

    -- recompute Kp periodically
    if os.time() - lastKpCalc > KP_RECALC_INTERVAL then
      recalcKp()
    end

    -- instant available power
    -- choose whether you power the injector from output or from external grid
    local injectorFromOutput = true   -- EDIT THIS if your injector is externally powered
    local A = G
    if injectorFromOutput then A = G - F end

    -- compute limit with proportional correction on temp error
    local tempErr = T - T_SET
    local correction = Kp * tempErr
    local rawLimit = SAFETY_FACTOR * A - correction

    -- clamp and write to flux gate
    local limit = math.max(0, math.floor(rawLimit + 0.5))
    setFluxLimit(limit)

    -- small status print
    term.clear(); term.setCursorPos(1,1)
    print(("T: %.1f°C  G: %d  F: %d  A: %d  Kp: %d  Limit: %d"):format(T, G, F, A, Kp, limit))
  end)

  os.sleep(SAMPLE_INTERVAL)
end

content:
```
#!/bin/bash

# clipcpy: Copy file contents or stdin to the clipboard.

# Function to display an error message and exit
error_exit() {
    echo "[ERROR] $1" >&2
    exit 1
}

# Determine the operating system and clipboard command
if command -v pbcopy &> /dev/null; then
    CLIPBOARD_CMD="pbcopy"
elif command -v xclip &> /dev/null; then
    CLIPBOARD_CMD="xclip -selection clipboard"
elif command -v xsel &> /dev/null; then
    CLIPBOARD_CMD="xsel --clipboard --input"
else
    error_exit "Clipboard tool (pbcopy, xclip, or xsel) not found."
fi

# Check for the number of arguments
if [ "$#" -gt 1 ]; then
    error_exit "This script accepts 0 or 1 arguments."
fi

# Read from file if an argument is provided, otherwise read from stdin
if [ "$#" -eq 1 ]; then
    if [ -f "$1" ]; then
        echo "[INFO] Reading from file: $1"
        cat "$1" | $CLIPBOARD_CMD
    else
        error_exit "File not found: $1"
    fi
else
    echo "[INFO] No file provided. Reading from stdin..."
    $CLIPBOARD_CMD
fi

echo "[INFO] Content copied to clipboard."


```

Once user says EXECUTE, write code, or do all and any other actions necessary to achieve the milestone. If the user is satisfied, they will reply MILESTONE COMPLETED. Otherwise they will comment, give orders, or otherwise instruct you as to what they want to accomplish instead, or further. You have yo prepare THE PLAN to comply.
You work in this way - executing milestones in (THE PLAN  -> [ maybe improve the plan -> ] EXECUTE -> [ maybe loop multiple times -> ] MILESTONE COMPLETED). 
Once a milestone is completed, you move on to the next milestone - executing the same framework of PLAN-EXECUTE-MILESTONE.
